MAT 17:12 Nambo ngunsalila, che Elia amasile kwika, nganammanyilila, nambo ŵantendele iŵasachile. Nombewo chachinnagasya Mwana jwa Mundu iyoyopeyo.”
MAT 17:13 Pelepo ŵakulijiganya ŵala ŵaimanyilile kuti ŵangambaga che Yohana Ŵakubatisya.
MAT 17:14 Paŵaiche sooni pa wele mpingo wa ŵandu ula, ŵaiche mundu jumo mmbujo pa Che Yesu ni kwatindiŵalila,
MAT 17:15 ŵatite, “Ambuje, munkolele chanasa mwanangu pakuŵa akulwala njilinjili ni kulaga nnope, katema kakajinji akugwilila pa mooto pane mmeesi.
MAT 17:16 Nannyichisye kwa ŵakulijiganya ŵenu, nambo nganakombola kunnamya.”
MAT 17:17 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Uŵelesi wangali chikulupi ni wakulyungasika, ana chime ni ŵanyamwe mpaka chakachi? Mpaka chakachi chinampililile? Munjise nawo apano.”
MAT 17:18 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵalikalipile lisoka lila, nombelyo lyankopweche ni jwanchanda jula ŵalamile katema kakoko.
MAT 17:19 Nipele, ŵakulijiganya ŵaichile Che Yesu kwa chisyepela ni kwausya, “Ligongo chi nganitukombola kulikoposya lisoka lila?”
MAT 17:20 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Kwa ligongo lya chikulupi chenu chachinandi. Ngunsalila isyene, mwaŵaga ni chikulupi atamuno chaŵaga chachinandi chisau mbeju jajinandi nnope jajikuŵilanjikwa haladali, chinkombole kuchisalila achi chitumbi chi, ‘Ntyoche apa njaule ako,’ nombecho chichityoche. Ngalipagwa liloŵe lyangalikombolecheka kukwenu.”
MAT 17:21 Nambo lisoka lyanti yele ngalikutyosyekwa ikaŵe kwa kupopela ni kutaŵa.
MAT 17:22 Ŵakulijiganya paŵaliji pamo ku Galilaya, Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Mwana jwa Mundu akwaula kukutagwa mmakono ga ŵandu.
MAT 17:23 Nombewo chachimmulaga, nambo chachisyuka pa lyuŵa lyaatatu.” Pelepo ŵakulijiganya ŵasongoneche nnope.
MAT 17:24 Che Yesu ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵaiche ku Kapelenaumu ŵandu ŵakukumbikanya nsongo wa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ŵaichilile che Petulo, ŵausisye, “Ana jwakwiganya jwenu akulipa nsongo wa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu?”
MAT 17:25 Che Petulo ŵajanjile, “Elo, akulipa.” Nipele, che Petulo paŵajinjile mu nyuumba, akanaŵe kuŵecheta liloŵe, Che Yesu ŵalongolele kummusya achitiji, “Che Simoni, mmwe nkuti uli? Mamwenye ŵa pa chilambo akukumbikanya nsongo atamuno ushulu kwa ŵandu chi? Kutyochela kwa achinsyene musi pane kwa achalendo?”
MAT 17:26 Che Petulo ŵajanjile, “Kutyochela kwa achalendo.” Che Yesu ŵansalile, “Nipele, iŵaga ili yeleyo, achinsyene musi wo ngakusachilwa kulipa.
MAT 17:27 Nambo tukaachima ŵandu ŵa. Njaule kulitanda nkaloposye, ni somba jandanda kutanjila pa ndowana, nkajiunukule kang'wa ni chinkasisimane mbiya sya nsongo. Njigale ni kwapa ligongo lyangune ni lyenu mmwe.”
MAT 18:1 Kekala katema kala ŵakulijiganya ŵaichilile Che Yesu ni kwausya, “Ana nduni jwaali jwankulungwa mu Umwenye wa kwinani?”
MAT 18:2 Che Yesu ŵambilasile mwanache, ŵanjimiche mmbujo mwao.
MAT 18:3 Nipele ŵatite, “Isyene ngunsalila, iŵaga ngankugalauka ni kuŵa mpela ŵanache, nganjinjila kose mu umwenye wa kwinani.
MAT 18:4 Nipele jwalijose jwakulitimalika mpela aju mwanache ju, jwelejo ni jwali jwankulungwa mu umwenye wa kwinani.
MAT 18:5 Jwalijose jwakumpochela mwanache jumo mpela aju mu liina lyangu, jwelejo akumbochela une.”
MAT 18:6 “Nambo jwalijose juchantende jumo jwa achanandi ŵa, ŵakungulupilila une atende sambi, ikaliji yambone kwa ŵelewo ataŵikwe pa lukosi liganga lyekulungwa lya kusyajila ni kumponya mu bahali pakwendesya nnope.
MAT 18:7 Ulaje chiuŵe kwa ŵandu ŵa pa chilambo kwa ligongo lya kuichisya indu ya kwatenda ŵandu atende sambi. Indu yo ikusachilwa ikopochele nambo ulaje kukwakwe mundu juchaichenawo indu yo.
MAT 18:8 “Iŵaga nkono wenu pane lukongolo lwenu lukuntenda ntende sambi, mmukate nkaujase kwakutalika. Mmbaya kukwenu kwinjila mu umi pangali nkono umo pane lukongolo lumo kupunda kuponyekwa pa mooto wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi wangasimika ndi ni makono gaŵili ni makongolo gaŵili.
MAT 18:9 Ni liso lyenu lyantendaga ntende sambi, nlikolopole ni kuliponya kwakutalika. Mmbaya kukwenu kwinjila mu umi wangamala ni liso limo, kupunda kuponyekwa pa mooto wangasimika moŵa gose pangali mbesi ndi ni meeso gaŵili.
MAT 18:10 “Nlilolechesye! Nkanchembulusya jumo jwa achanandi ŵa. Ngunsalila, achikatumetume ŵao kwinani ko moŵa gose akulola usyo wa Atati ŵaali kwinani.
MAT 18:11 Pakuŵa Mwana jwa Mundu ŵaiche kukwakulupusya aŵala ŵaŵasochele.
MAT 18:12 “Ana ŵanyamwe nkuti uli, Mundu akolaga ngondolo mia moja, ni jasochelaga ngondolo jimo, ngaasileka ngondolo tisini na tisa sila pasyaliji po ni kwaula kukujisosa jajisochele jila?
MAT 18:13 Ajisimanaga, ngunsalila isyene, akusengwa ligongo lya jejila kusipunda tisini na tisa syangasochela sila.
MAT 18:14 Iyoyo Atati ŵenu ŵa kwinani ngakusaka ata jumo jwa achanandi ŵa kuti asochele.
MAT 18:15 “Nlongo njenu anleŵelaga, munjaulile nkanlosye chileŵo chakwe nli ŵaŵili pe. Ampilikanilaga chimme mumpatile nlongo njenu.
MAT 18:16 Nambo iŵaga ngakumpilikanila, munjigale mundu jumo pane ŵaŵili pakuti kwa kang'wa sya ŵaumboni ŵaŵili pane ŵatatu, kila liloŵe likaluche, mpela Malembelo ga Akunnungu yagakuti pakusala.
MAT 18:17 Akanaga kwapilikanichisya ŵanyawo, muusalile mpingo wa ŵandu ŵakunkulupilila Kilisito. Ni akanaga kuupilikanila mpingo wa ŵandu ŵakunkulupilila Kilisito, mummalanjile yalumo mundu jwangakwamanyilila Akunnungu ni jwakukumbikanya nsongo.
MAT 18:18 “Ngunsalila isyene, gagali gose gachingakanye pachilambo chigaŵe gamakanikwe kwinani ni gagali gose gachingakunde pachilambo, chigaŵe gamakundikwe kwinani.
MAT 18:19 “Ngunsalila isyene, ŵaŵili pasikati jenu ajilanaga pachilambo pano kwa chindu chachilichose chichaŵende, Atati ŵangu ŵa kwinani chiŵapanganyichisye chindu cho.
MAT 18:20 Pakuŵa palipose pakusongangana ŵandu ŵaŵili pane ŵatatu pamo kwa liina lyangu, une ndili pelepo ni ŵanyawo.”
MAT 18:21 Nipele, che Petulo ŵaichile Che Yesu nikuti, “Ambuje, ana mpwanga aneŵele kalingwa none naalechelesye? Mala saba?”
MAT 18:22 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ngangunsalila mala saba pe, nambo saba mala sabini.
MAT 18:23 Kwayele, Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mwenye jumo juŵasakaga kulola achikapolo ŵakwe yatite pakupanganya.
MAT 18:24 Paŵatandite kulola, ŵannyichisye mundu jumo juŵaliji ni ligambo lya mamilioni kwa mamilioni.
MAT 18:25 Mundu jo nganakola chakulipa, kwayele ambujegwe ŵalamwile asumisikwe nti kapolo mundu jula ni ŵankwakwe ni achiŵanagwe ni yanayose iŵakwete, kuti ligambo limale.
MAT 18:26 Nipele, kapolo jula ŵatindiŵele mmbujo pa ambujegwe ni kwaŵenda achitiji, ‘Ambuje mumbililile kaje, none chinanlipe yose.’
MAT 18:27 Mmbujegwe kapolo jula ŵankolele chanasa, ŵannechelesye ligambo lila, ni kuntendela ajaule.
MAT 18:28 “Nambo kapolo jula ŵatyosile, ŵansimene jumo jwa achikapolo achinjakwe juŵandaiji mbiya kanandi. Ŵankamwile ni kunkamula pa lukosi achitiji, ‘Nlipe ligambo lyenu!’
MAT 18:29 Nombe kapolo njakwe jula ŵatindiŵele pa makongolo gakwe ŵanchondelele achitiji, ‘Mumbililile kaje, none chinanlipe yose’.
MAT 18:30 Nombejo ŵakanile, ŵajawile kukumponya mu nyuumba jakutaŵilwa, mpaka patachilipa ligambo lila.
MAT 18:31 “Nipele, achikapolo achinjakwe paŵaiweni yeleyo ŵasongoneche nnope, ŵajawile kukwasalila ambuje ŵao yose iyatendekwe.
MAT 18:32 Pele ambujegwe ŵammilasile ni kunsalila, ‘Ugwe jwakutumichila jwangalumbana nnope! Nannechelesye ligambo lila lyose pamwanjondelele.
MAT 18:33 Ana nganinsachilwa kunkolela chanasa kapolo njenu jo mpela inatite pakunkolela chanasa mmwe?’
MAT 18:34 “Nipele mmbujegwe jula ŵatumbile nnope, ŵampeleche katumetume jula kwa ŵakulagasya mpaka pele patachilipa ligambo lyose.
MAT 18:35 Ni atati ŵangu ŵa kwinani chachintendela iyoyo peyo iŵaga jwalijose mwa ŵanyamwe ngannechelesya mpwakwe ni mtima wakwe wose.”
MAT 19:1 Che Yesu paŵamasile kuŵecheta gele maloŵe go, ŵatyosile ku Galilaya, ŵapite ku Yudea peesi lusulo lwa Yolodani.
MAT 19:2 Ŵandu achajinji ŵakuiye ŵelewo kweleko, nombejo ŵalamisye ilwele yao.
MAT 19:3 Mafalisayo ŵaichile achalingaga achitiji, “Uli, ana ikusachilwa mundu kunleka ŵankwakwe kwa ligongo lililyose?”
MAT 19:4 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Uli, ana nganinsyoma Mmalembelo ga Akunnungu kuti Akunnungu juŵangumbile mundu kutyochela kundanda ŵaagumbile jwannume ni jwankongwe?
MAT 19:5 Ŵapundile kusala, ‘Kwaligongo lyo jwannume chiŵaaleche atatigwe ni achikulugwe, chalumbikane ni ŵankwakwe, nombe ŵaŵili wo chachiŵa chiilu chimo?’
MAT 19:6 Kwa yeleyo, ngaaŵa sooni ŵaŵili, nambo chiilu chimo. Nipele chalumbikenye Akunnungu, mundu akachilekanganya.”
MAT 19:7 Nambo ŵele ŵanyawo ŵausisye, “Nambi kwachichi che Musa ŵatulamwile kuti jwankongwe apegwe talaka ni kunleka?”
MAT 19:8 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Che Musa ŵannechelele nlekangane ni achiŵankwenu kwa ligongo lya kukakatima kwa mitima jenu. Nambo chitandile kundanda nginiŵa yeleyi.
MAT 19:9 Nipele none ngunsalila ŵanyamwe, mundu juchalekangane ni ŵankwakwe kwaligongo lililyose ni kulombela jwankongwe jwine, ikaŵe kwa ligongo lya chikululu, akutenda chikululu.”
MAT 19:10 Ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaasalile, “Iŵaga yele kwa mundu ni ŵankwakwe, nipele mmbaya kutama pangalombela.”
MAT 19:11 Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Ngaŵa ŵanawose ŵakukombola kulipochela liloŵe li, nambo ikaŵe ŵele ŵandu ŵapegwile ni Akunnungu machili ga kulipochela liloŵe li.
MAT 19:12 Pakuŵa kwana indu yakupisyangana yaikuntendekasya mundu kutama pangalombela, apali ŵaŵaŵelekwe yeleyo, ni ŵane atesilwe ni ŵandu atame ŵangalombela ni ŵane asachile achinsyene atame pangalombela kwaligongo lya umwenye wa kwinani. Jwakukombola kulipochela liloŵe li apochele.”
MAT 19:13 Nipele ŵannyichisye Che Yesu ŵanache achanandi kuti ŵasajichile makono ni kwapopelela. Nambo ŵakulijiganya ŵao ni ŵakalipile.
MAT 19:14 Che Yesu ŵatite, “Mwaleche ŵanache aichanje kukwangu ni nkaasiŵila, pakuŵa Umwenye wa kwinani uli wa ŵandu ŵaali mpela ŵanache ŵa.”
MAT 19:15 Nipele, ŵasajichile makono kuti ŵape upile, ni ŵatyosile pelepo.
MAT 19:16 Mundu jumo ŵaichile Che Yesu ŵausisye, “Jwakwiganya, ana ndende chindu chi chichili chambone kuti ngapate umi wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi?”
MAT 19:17 Che Yesu ŵansalile, “Kwachichi nkuusya yankati umbone? Ngapagwa jwambone, nambo jumope yaani Akunnungu. Mwasakaga kwinjila mu umi, ngakamulichisye makanyo.”
MAT 19:18 Mundu jula ŵausisye, “Makanyo chi?” Che Yesu ŵatite, “Kasimmulaga ni Kasintenda chikululu ni Kasinjiŵa ni Kasinsala ya unami.
MAT 19:19 Sooni, mwachimbichisye atati ŵenu ni achikulu ŵenu ni Munnonyele njenu mpela inkuti pakulinonyela mwasyene.”
MAT 19:20 Jwanchanda jula ŵatite, “Makanyo ganagose nagakamulisye chitandile wanache wangu, chisoŵile chindu chi sooni?”
MAT 19:21 Che Yesu ŵansalile jwelejo, “Mwasakaga kuŵa jwautindimisyo, njaule nkasumisye yose inkwete ni mbiya syo nkaape ŵandu ŵakulaga, nomwe chinkole mbiko kwinani, mwamalaga muunguye.”
MAT 19:22 Paŵapilikene yele jwele nchanda jo, ŵajawile aninkusongoneka mu ntima, pakuŵa ŵakwete chipanje chachijinji.
MAT 19:23 Pelepo Che Yesu ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao, “Ngunsalila isyene, chiiŵe yakulimba jwachipanje kwinjila mu Umwenye wa kwinani.
MAT 19:24 Ngunsalila sooni, ili yakwaluka kwa chinyama chachikuŵilanjikwa ngamia kupeleta pachipowo cha sindano, kupunda jwachipanje kwinjila mu umwenye wa Akunnungu.”
MAT 19:25 Ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵapilikene yele, ŵasimosile nnope, ŵausisye, “Ŵaani nambi, akukombola kukulupuka?”
MAT 19:26 Che Yesu ŵalolite, nikuti, “Lyeleli lili lyangakomboleka kwa ŵandu, nambo kwa Akunnungu indu yose ikukomboleka.”
MAT 19:27 Nipele, che Petulo ŵajanjile, “Nnole, uwe tulesile yose ni kunkuya, chitupate chichi nambi?”
MAT 19:28 Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Ngunsalila isyene, Mwana jwa Mundu pachatame pa chitengu cha umwenye cha ukulu wao mu chilambo cha sambano, ŵanyamwe umunguiye chintame mu itengu kumi na mbili ni kusilamula ngosyo kumi na mbili sya ŵandu ŵa ku Isilaeli.
MAT 19:29 Ni jwalijose jwalesile nyuumba pane achapwakwe pane achalumbugwe pane atatigwe pane achikulugwe pane ŵanache pane migunda, kwa ligongo lyangu, chachipochela mala mia, ni chachinjila mu umi wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi.
MAT 19:30 Nambo ŵajinji ŵaali ŵandanda sambano chachiŵa ŵambesi ni ŵaali ŵambesi sambano chachiŵa ŵandanda.
MAT 20:1 “Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mundu jwaali ni ngunda wa sabibu, juŵatyosile kundaŵi pe kukwaŵika ŵandu ŵakulima mu ngunda wao.
MAT 20:2 Paŵamasile kulangana ni ŵakulima kuti chachalipa chipande chimo cha madini ga feza malinga ni malipilo ga lyuŵa limo, ŵapeleche ku ngunda wa sabibu.
MAT 20:3 Ŵatyosile saa tatu kundaŵi, ŵaweni ŵane ŵangali ni masengo ali ajimi pakusumichisya malonda.
MAT 20:4 Ŵaasalile, ‘Njende ni ŵanyamwe ku ngunda wa sabibu, none chinanlipe.’
MAT 20:5 Nipele, ŵapite. Asyene ngunda ŵala ŵatyosile sooni saa sita ni saa tisa, ŵatesile iyoyo.
MAT 20:6 Pajaŵandichile saa kumi na moja, ŵatyosile sooni, ŵasimene ŵandu ŵane ali ajimi papopo pakusumisya malonda. Nipele ŵausisye, ‘Kwachichi nkwima apano muusi wose u pangali masengo?’
MAT 20:7 Ŵajanjile, ‘Pakuŵa ngapagwa mundu jwatupele masengo.’ Nombejo ŵaasalile, ‘Njaule ni ŵanyamwe nkapanganye masengo ku ngunda wa sabibu.’
MAT 20:8 “Pakwaswele, nsyene ngunda wa sabibu jula ŵansalile jwakulolela masengo gao kuti, ‘Nkaaŵilanje ŵamasengo mwape malipilo gao, kutandila ŵa kumbesi mpaka ŵa kundanda.’
MAT 20:9 Nipele, ŵaiche ŵele ŵaŵapegwilwe masengo katema ka saa kumi na moja, jwalijose ŵapochele chipande chimo cha madini ga feza.
MAT 20:10 Ni ŵandanda ŵala paŵaiche ŵaganichisye kuti chapochele yakupunda, nambo nombe ŵanyawo ŵapochele chipande chimo cha madini ga feza yalumo ni achinjao.
MAT 20:11 Paŵapochele mbiya syao, ŵatandite kwasongonechela asyene ngunda ŵala.
MAT 20:12 Ŵatite, ‘Aŵaŵa ŵaŵapele masengo kumbesi apangenye masengo kwa katema ka lisaa limo pe, kwachichi ntulipile yalumo ni ŵanyaŵa akuno uweji tupililile masengo gakulimba muusi wose ni lyuŵa lili nkuŵala?’
MAT 20:13 “Pelepo nsyene ngunda jula ŵanjanjile jumo jwao kuti, ‘Ambusanga, ngangummonela! Ana nganitulangana none kwa malipilo ga chipande chimo cha madini ga feza?
MAT 20:14 Njigale chichili chenu, njaule kumangwenu. Ngunonyelwa kumpa aju junampele masengo kumbesi yalumo ni mmwe.
MAT 20:15 Uli, ngangusachilwa kutenda indu ingunonyelwa nkati yose ingwete? Ana nkukola wiwu pakuŵa une ndili jwambone?’ ”
MAT 20:16 Nipele Che Yesu ŵamalichisye kwa kusala, “Iyoyo ŵaali ŵambesi chachiŵa ŵandanda ni ŵaali ŵandanda chachiŵa ŵambesi.”
MAT 20:17 Che Yesu paŵaliji nkukwela kwaula ku Yelusalemu, ŵaajigele ŵakulijiganya ŵao kumi na mbili, paŵaliji nkwenda mwitala, peuto pangali ŵandu ŵane, ŵaasalile,
MAT 20:18 “Nnole! Tukwaula ku Yelusalemu, ni kwele Mwana jwa Mundu chakatajikwe mmakono mwa achakulu ŵambopesi ni ŵakwiganya Malajisyo, nombewo chalamulikwe aulajikwe.
MAT 20:19 Chakampeleche kwa ŵandu ŵangaŵa Ŵayahudi apate kuntendela chanache ni kumputa mbokola ni kwaŵamba pa nsalaba ni pa lyuŵa lyaatatu chachisyuka.”
MAT 20:20 Nipele achikulu ŵa ŵanache ŵa che Sebedayo ŵaichile Che Yesu, pamo ni achiŵanagwe, ŵatindiŵalile ni kwaŵenda chindu.
MAT 20:21 Che Yesu ŵammusisye, “Chichi nkusaka?” Ŵatite, “Choonde nlanje kuti mu umwenye wenu, achiŵanangu ŵaŵili ŵa chatame, jumo kundyo kwenu ni jwine kunchiji kwenu.”
MAT 20:22 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ana nkumanyilila chinkuchiŵenda! Uli chinkombole kuching'welela chikombe cha masauko chiching'wele une?” Ŵanyawo ŵajanjile, “Tukupakombola.”
MAT 20:23 Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Isyene chinng'welele chikombe changu cha masauko, nambo kutama kundyo ni kunchiji kwangu nganigaŵa masengo gangu nambo Akunnungu chachapa lipesa lyo ŵele ŵaŵakolochesye.”
MAT 20:24 Nombe ŵakulijiganya ŵane likumi ŵala paŵapilikene gele, ŵatumbilile ŵaŵili wo.
MAT 20:25 Nipele Che Yesu ŵaaŵilasile ni kwasalila, “Nkumanyilila kuti mamwenye ŵa ilambo akwalongosya ŵandu ŵao kwa machili, ni achakulu ŵao akwatenda ali ŵandu ŵao.
MAT 20:26 Nambo inaŵe yele kukwenu, nambo jwalijose jwakusaka kuŵa jwamkulungwa kukwenu akusachilwa aŵe katumetume jwa wose.
MAT 20:27 Ni jwalijose jwakusaka kuŵa jwaandanda kukwenu akusachilwa aŵe jwakutumichila jwenu.
MAT 20:28 Iyoyopeyo, Mwana jwa Mundu nganaika kuti atumichilwe nambo kuti atumichile, ni kuutyosya umi wakwe kuti gaŵe malipilo kwa ligongo lya chiwombolo cha ŵandu ŵajinji.”
MAT 20:29 Che Yesu ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵaliji nkutyoka ku Yeliko, mpingo wa ŵandu ŵaliji nkwakuya.
MAT 20:30 Nipele, ŵapali ŵangalola ŵaŵili uŵatemi mungulugulu litala, nombewo paŵapikene kuti Che Yesu ŵaliji nkupita pelepo, ŵanyanyisye achitiji, “Ambuje, Mwana ju che Daudi, choonde ntukolele chanasa!”
MAT 20:31 Mpingo wa ŵandu wakalipile ni kwasalila amyalale. Nambo ŵanyawo ŵapundangenye kunyanyisya, achitiji, “Ambuje, Mwana ju che Daudi, choonde ntukolele chanasa!”
MAT 20:32 Che Yesu ŵajimi, ŵaaŵilasile ni kwausya, “Ana nkusaka nampanganyichisye ichichi?”
MAT 20:33 Ŵajanjile, “Ambuje, tukummenda gaunukuche meeso getu.”
MAT 20:34 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵakolele chanasa, ŵakwaiye meeso gao ni papopo ŵakombwele kulola, ni ŵankuiye.
MAT 21:1 Che Yesu pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaŵandichile ku Yelusalemu, ni paŵaiche ku Besefage pachikwesya cha Miseituni, ŵatumile ŵakulijiganya ŵaŵili.
MAT 21:2 Ŵaasalile, “Njaule kunsinda wauli mmbujo mwenu, ni kweleko chinkajisimane mbunda jajitaŵikwe ni mwanambunda pamo najo. Nkaagopole njise nawo kwangune.
MAT 21:3 Iŵaga chakammusye mundu ligongo lya kwagopola, nkajile, ‘Ambuje akusisaka,’ ni pangakaŵa chakannechele.”
MAT 21:4 Ali lyatendekwe kuti gamalile gaŵaŵechete jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu.
MAT 21:5 “Mwasalile ŵandu ŵa musi wa Sayuni, Nnole, Mwenye jwenu akunnyichilila! Atulele, ni akwesile mbunda, ni mwanambunda, chinyama chachikujigala itutule.”
MAT 21:6 Ŵakulijiganya ŵala ŵajawile, ŵatesile mpela iŵatite pakusalilwa ni Che Yesu.
MAT 21:7 Ŵajiichenawo mbunda ni mwanambunda, ŵatandiche nguo syao pachanya pawo ni Che Yesu ŵatemi pachanya pakwe.
MAT 21:8 Mpingo wekulungwa wa ŵandu watandiche nguo syao mwitala, ni ŵane ŵakatile nyambi sya mwana sya itela ni ŵatandiche mwitala.
MAT 21:9 Mipingo ja ŵandu ŵaŵalongolele ni ŵaŵakuiye ŵanyanyisye achitiji, “Ajinichilwe Mwana ju che Daudi, Akole upile jwele jwakwika mu liina lya Ambuje! Ajinichilwe Akunnungu ŵaali kwinani!”
MAT 21:10 Che Yesu paŵajinjilaga ku Yelusalemu, ŵandu ŵa musi wose ŵaliji jugulijuguli. Ŵandu ŵaliji nkuusyana, “Ana aju ali nduni?”
MAT 21:11 Ŵandu mu mpingo ula ŵatite, “Ŵeleŵa ni Che Yesu, jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu kutyochela ku Nasaleti musi wa ku Galilaya.”
MAT 21:12 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵajinjile mu lutenje lwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ŵaaŵinjile ŵanawose uŵasumisyaga ni kusuma malonda pepala, ŵapitikwisye mesa sya ŵaŵasumanyaga mbiya, ni itengu yao ŵaŵasumisyaga nguunda.
MAT 21:13 Ŵaasalile, “Ilembekwe Mmalembelo ga Akunnungu, ‘Nyuumba jangu chijiŵilanjikwe nyuumba ja kupopelela.’ Nambo ŵanyamwe njitesile peuto pakulisisila ŵa wiyi.”
MAT 21:14 Ŵangalola ni ŵakulemala ŵanjaulile pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, nombe Che Yesu ŵalamisye.
MAT 21:15 Achakulu ŵambopesi ni ŵakwiganya Malajisyo paŵaiweni indu yambone nnope iŵaitesile Che Yesu ni ŵanache ali nkunyanyisya pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu achitiji, “Ajinichilwe Mwana ju che Daudi,” ŵanyawo ŵatumbile.
MAT 21:16 Ŵausisye, “Uli ngankupilikana yakuti ŵanache?” Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Elo, ngupikana! Ana nganinsyome Maloŵe ga? ‘Kutyochela nkang'wa sya ŵanache achanandi ni ŵakonga, nlipatile lumbili lwemalilwe.’ ”
MAT 21:17 Nipele, ŵalesile, ŵakopweche mmusi ni kwaula ku Besania ni kugona kweleko.
MAT 21:18 Kundaŵi, Che Yesu paŵaujaga kwaula ku Yelusalemu, jakwete sala.
MAT 21:19 Ŵauweni ntini mungulugulu litala, ŵaujaulile, nambo nganachisimana chindu mwelemo, ŵausimene uli masamba pe. Ŵausalile, “Nkasogola isogosi sooni moŵa gose pangali mbesi!” Papopo nkuju wo wanyasile.
MAT 21:20 Ŵakulijiganya paŵauweni, ŵasimosile, ŵaliusisye, “Ntini u ujumwile chinauli chitema kwantinyi?”
MAT 21:21 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ngunsalila isyene, mwaŵaga ni chikulupi pangali lipamba lili lyose, chinkombole kupanganya ngaŵa yeleyo pe yaitendekwe mu chitela cha ntini, nambo atamuno mwachisalilaga achi chitumbi chi, ‘Ntupuche ni kuliponya mu bahali,’ chiitendekwe iyoyo.
MAT 21:22 Mwakolaga chikulupi, chachilichose chachimmende nkupopela, chimpate.”
MAT 21:23 Che Yesu ŵajinjile pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ni kwiganya. Paŵajiganyaga, achakulu ŵa mbopesi ni achakulu ŵane ŵa ŵandu ŵausisye kuti, “Ana kwa ukombole chi nkutenda yele indu yi? Ŵaani ŵampele wele ukombole u?”
MAT 21:24 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “None chinammusye liusyo limo pe, mwanyangaga, nipele, none chinansalile kwa ukombole chi nguitenda indu yi.
MAT 21:25 Uli ukombole u che Yohana wa kubatisya watyochele kwapi? Watyochele kwinani pane kwa ŵandu?” Nambo ŵaŵechetesyene achinsyene pe achitiji, “Twajilaga, ‘Watyosile kwinani,’ chatuusye, ‘Nambi kwachichi nganimunkulupilila?’
MAT 21:26 Nambo twajilaga, ‘Watyochele kwa ŵandu,’ tukogopa mpingo wa ŵandu pakuŵa ŵanawose akwitichisya kuti che Yohana ali jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu.”
MAT 21:27 Nipele, ŵajanjile, “Ngatukumanyilila!” Nombe Che Yesu ŵatite, “Atamuno une ngangunsalila ŵanyamwe kwa ukombole chi nguitenda indu yi.
MAT 21:28 “Ŵanyamwe nkuganisya uli? Mundu jumo ŵakwete achachanda ŵaŵili. Ŵantendele jwaandanda jo kuti, ‘Mwanangu, lelo njaule nkapanganye masengo mungunda wa sabibu.’
MAT 21:29 Nchanda jo ŵajanjile, ‘Ngangusaka!’ Nambo kanyuma kakwe ŵapitikwiche ntima, ŵajawile kupanganya masengo.
MAT 21:30 Atati ŵala ŵanjaulile mwanagwe jwaaŵili jo ni kunsalila ilaila, nombe ŵajanjile ŵatite, ‘Elo, atati!’ Nambo nganajaula kumasengo.
MAT 21:31 Ana jwapi jwa ŵele ŵaŵili wo jwatesile yakuisaka atatigwe?” Ŵajanjile, “Jwanchanda jwaandanda jo.” Che Yesu ŵatite, “Ngunsalila isyene, ŵakukumbikanya nsongo ni ŵakulaŵalaŵa chajinjile mu Umwenye wa Akunnungu nkanaŵe kwinjila.
MAT 21:32 Pakuŵa che Yohana ŵaiche kukwenu ni kunnanjila kutama yambone nti yakuti pakusaka Akunnungu, ni ŵanyamwe nganimunkulupilila, nambo ŵakukumbikanya nsongo ni ŵakulaŵalaŵa ŵankulupilile. Ni ŵanyamwe pammasile kugawona gele nganinleka sambi ni kunkulupilila.”
MAT 21:33 Che Yesu ŵatite, “Mpilikanile chitagu chine. Jwapali mundu jumo nsyene nyuumba ŵalimile ngunda wa sabibu, ŵausyunguchisye lutenje ni ŵakolosisye pakuminyila sabibu, ŵataŵile chilindo mmomopemo. Nipele ŵaujasimisye kwa ŵakulima ni kwaula ku chilambo cha kutalika.
MAT 21:34 Katema ka kugungula, ŵatumile achikapolo ŵao kwa ŵakulima ŵala, kuti akajigale liunjili lyakwe lya magungulo.
MAT 21:35 Ŵakulima ŵala ŵakamwile achikapolo ŵao, jumo ŵamputile, ni jwine ŵammuleje, ni jwine ŵamponyile maganga.
MAT 21:36 Sooni ŵatumile achikapolo ŵane ŵajinji kupunda ŵa kundanda. Ŵakulima ŵala ŵajasime ngunda ŵatendele ilaila.
MAT 21:37 Kumbesi kwakwe ŵantumile mwanagwe achiganisyaga mu ntima wakwe achitiji, ‘Chakanchimbichisye mwanangu.’
MAT 21:38 Nambo ŵakulima ŵala paŵammweni mwanagwao ŵaŵechetesyene achinsyene pe, ‘Aju ni juchapochele iŵagosele, twende tummulaje kuti indu iŵagosele tujigale uwe!’
MAT 21:39 Nipele, ŵankamwile, ŵantyosisye paasa ngunda wa sabibu, ŵammuleje.
MAT 21:40 “Sambano, nsyene ngunda wa sabibu jula pachachiika, chachatenda ichichi ŵakulima ŵala?”
MAT 21:41 Ŵanyawo ŵajanjile, “Chachajonanga wamba ŵele ŵachigongomalo wo ni ngunda wa sabibu ula chachiujasimisya kwa ŵakulima ŵane uchachapa liunjili lyakwe lya magungulo kwa katema kakwe.”
MAT 21:42 Pelepo Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Uli ana nganinsyome lye liloŵe li Mmalembelo ga Akunnungu? ‘Liganga liŵalikanile ŵakutaŵa sambano lilyolyo lili lyetendekwe liganga lyalikusachilwa kwannope kugapunda maganga gose. Ambuje ni ŵatesile achi chindu chi, nombe chili chakusimonjeka nnope kwetuwe!’
MAT 21:43 “Kwayele ngunsalila, Umwenye wa Akunnungu chiutyosekwe kukwenu, ni kupegwa ŵandu ŵakupanganya yakuisaka Akunnungu.”
MAT 21:44 Jwalijose juchagwilile pa liganga lyo chakasiche ipande ipande, ni jwalijose juchilyagwilile, chilinkanyatekanyate.
MAT 21:45 Achakulu ŵa mbopesi ni Mafalisayo paŵapilikene itagu yao, ŵamanyilile kuti ŵaliji nkwagamba ŵanyawo.
MAT 21:46 Nipele ŵasosaga litala lya kwakamula, nambo ŵajogwepe ŵandu pakuŵa ŵanyawo ŵanganisisye nti jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu.
MAT 22:1 Che Yesu ŵaŵechetenawo sooni kwa itagu achitiji,
MAT 22:2 “Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mwenye jumpepe juŵantendele mwanagwe chindimba cha chakulya cha ulombela.
MAT 22:3 Nipele ŵatumile achikapolo ŵao kukwaŵilanga ŵaalaliche kwika ku ulombela, nambo ŵakanile kwika.
MAT 22:4 Ŵaatumile sooni achikapolo ŵane, achitiji, ‘Mwasalile ŵalalichikwe ŵala kuti, jwammale kolosya yakulya yangu, sikite ng'ombe jangu ja nkambaku ni ng'ombe sine syakunakana, inayose ili chile, njise ku ulombela.’
MAT 22:5 Nambo ŵandu ŵala ŵakanile kwika, ŵajawile, jumo ku ngunda wakwe, ni jwine ku masengo gakwe,
MAT 22:6 ni ŵane ŵaakamwile achikapolo ŵala ŵaputile ni ŵane kwaulaga.
MAT 22:7 Mwenye jula ŵatumbile, ŵaatumile ŵandu ŵangondo ŵao kuti akaaulaje ŵakuulaga ŵala ni kuchoma mooto musi wao.
MAT 22:8 Nipele ŵaasalile achikapolo ŵao, ‘Ulombela uli chile, nambo unalaliche ŵala nganaŵajilwa.
MAT 22:9 Nipele njaule mmalekano ni ŵanawose uchinkaasimane, nkaaŵilanje aichanje ku chindimba cha chakulya cha ulombela.’
MAT 22:10 Achikapolo ŵao ŵala ŵatyosile, ŵajawile mmatala, ŵaichenawo wose uŵasimene nawo, ŵangalumbana ni ŵambone. Nyuumba ja ulombela jagumbele achalendo.
MAT 22:11 “Nambo paŵajinjile mwenye ku kwalola achalendo, ŵammweni mundu jumo jwanganatakula nguo sya ulombela.
MAT 22:12 Mwenye ŵammusisye, ‘Ambusanga, njinjile chinauli, nomwe nganinkola nguo sya ulombela?’ Nambo ŵelewo ŵamyalele.
MAT 22:13 Nipele, mwenye ŵaasalile achikatumetume ŵao, ‘Muntaŵe makongolo ni makono, mkamponye paasa ku chipi, kweleko chakalile ni kuchilimya meeno.’ ”
MAT 22:14 Che Yesu ŵamalichisye achitiji, “Ŵajinji ŵakuŵilanjikwa, nambo ŵasagulikwe nganatupa.”
MAT 22:15 Nipele, Mafalisayo ŵajawile, ŵajilene itajile pa kwatanjisya Che Yesu kwa maloŵe gao.
MAT 22:16 Nipele, ŵaatumile ŵakulijiganya ŵao, pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵa mumpingo u che Helode ku Che Yesu. Ŵausisye achitiji, “Jwakwiganya, tukumanyilila kuti mmwe ndi mundu jwakulupilichika, nkwiganya litala lya Akunnungu kwa usyene, pangaganisya ŵandu akusala chichi, pakuŵa ngankulola ukulu wa mundu.
MAT 22:17 Sambano, ntusalile, nkuganisya ichichi? Uli ili yambone kulipa nsongo kwa mwenye jwankulu jwa ku Loma pane akuŵilanjikwa che Kaisali, pane tunalipe?”
MAT 22:18 Nambo Che Yesu ŵaumanyilile nningwa wao wangalumbana, ŵaasalile, “Kwachichi nkuuninga, ŵanyamwe ŵaulamba?
MAT 22:19 Munosye mbiya ja kulipila nsongo.” Nombewo ŵaiche nawo likobili.
MAT 22:20 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵausisye, “Aku ku meeso ku ni liina li ya ŵaani?”
MAT 22:21 Ŵajanjile, “Che Kaisali.” Pelepo Che Yesu ŵaasalile ŵanyawo kuti, “Nipele, i che Kaisali mwapeje che Kaisali, ni ya Akunnungu mwapeje Akunnungu.”
MAT 22:22 Paŵagapilikene gele ŵasimosile, ŵalesile, ŵajawile.
MAT 22:23 Lye lyuŵa lyo, Masadukayo ŵane ŵakuti ngapagwa kusyuka ŵaichilile Che Yesu,
MAT 22:24 nipele, ŵausisye, “Jwakwiganya, che Musa ŵatite mundu jwalombele awaga pangaleka ŵanache, ikusachilwa mpwakwe annombele jwankongwe jwawililwe ni ŵankwakwe, kuti ammelechele ŵanache nkulugwe.
MAT 22:25 Nipele, pa musi petu pano ŵapali ŵandu saba ŵaŵapagwile lutumbo lumo. Jwaandanda jo ŵalombele ni ŵawile pangali ŵanache, ni mpwakwe ŵannombile jwankongwe jula.
MAT 22:26 Iyoyo yaliji kwa jwaaŵili jula ni jwaatatu ni mpaka ŵanawose saba.
MAT 22:27 Paŵamasile kuwa ŵanawose saba, jwankongwe jula ŵawile.
MAT 22:28 Nambi, pa lyuŵa lya kusyuka jwele jwankongwe chaŵe jwa ŵaani mwa ŵele saba wo? Pakuŵa wose saba ŵannombile.”
MAT 22:29 Che Yesu ŵajanjile ŵanyawo, “Ŵanyamwe nkosele pakuŵa ngankugamanyilila Malembelo ga Akunnungu atamuno ukombole wa Akunnungu.
MAT 22:30 Pakuŵa pachachisyuka ŵawe ngalombela atamuno kulombwa, chaaŵe mpela achikatumetume ŵa kwinani.
MAT 22:31 Nambo yankati kusyuka kwa ŵawe, uli, nganinsyoma aila iŵansalile Akunnungu? Ŵansalile,
MAT 22:32 ‘Une ndili Akunnungu ŵa che Iblahimu ni Akunnungu ŵa che Isaka ni Akunnungu ŵa che Yakobo.’ Nipele ŵele nganaŵa Akunnungu ŵa ŵawe, nambo ŵa ŵajumi.”
MAT 22:33 Mpingo wa ŵandu ula paŵapilikene yeleyo, ŵagasimosile majiganyo gao.
MAT 22:34 Mafalisayo paŵapilikene kuti Che Yesu ŵamyalesye Masadukayo, ŵasongangene pamo.
MAT 22:35 Jumo jwao, ŵakwiganya malajisyo, ŵausisye Che Yesu achalingaga kuti,
MAT 22:36 “Jwakwiganya, likanyo chi lyalili lyekulungwa mu Malajisyo?”
MAT 22:37 Che Yesu ŵanjanjile, “ ‘Mwanonyele Ambuje Akunnungu ŵenu ni ntima wenu wose ni mbumu jenu jose ni lunda lwenu lose.’
MAT 22:38 Alili ni likanyo lyekulungwa ni lyaandanda.
MAT 22:39 Ni lyaaŵili lyalikulandana ni lyele, lili, ‘Munnonyele njenu mpela yankuti pakulinonyela mwasyene.’
MAT 22:40 Malajisyo gose ga Akunnungu gaŵapele che Musa ni majiganyo ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu gakukulupilila ge makanyo gaŵili ga.”
MAT 22:41 Paŵasongangene pamo Mafalisayo, Che Yesu ŵausisye,
MAT 22:42 “Ŵanyamwe nkuganisya uli yankati Kilisito? Uli ali mwanagwao ŵaani?” Ŵajanjile, “Ŵa che Daudi.”
MAT 22:43 Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Nipele, kwachichi che Daudi kwa ukombole wa Mbumu jwa Akunnungu akwaŵilanga Ambuje? Pakuŵa ŵatite,
MAT 22:44 ‘Ambuje ŵaasalile Ambuje ŵangu, ntame kundyo, mpaka pachinaaŵiche ŵammagongo ŵenu paasi pa makongolo genu.’
MAT 22:45 Nipele, iŵaga che Daudi akwaŵilanga Kilisito ‘Ambuje’ ikukomboleka chinauli kuti ali mwanagwao?”
MAT 22:46 Ngapagwa mundu jwalijose juŵakombwele kwanga. Chitandile lyuŵa lyo ngapagwa juŵalinjile sooni kummusya.
MAT 23:1 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵausalile mpingo wa ŵandu ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti,
MAT 23:2 “Ŵakwiganya malajisyo ni Mafalisayo akwete ukombole wa kusala uchenene Malajisyo.
MAT 23:3 Kwalye ligongo lyo mpikanichisye ni kutenda chachili chose chichansalile. Nambo nkasyasya isambo yao, pakuŵa ngakutenda yele yakuisala yo.
MAT 23:4 Akutaŵanga misigo jakutopela ni kwatwika ŵandu mmakoyo, nambo ŵele achinsyene wo ngakusaka atamuno kukwaya ni chala.
MAT 23:5 Ŵanyawo akugatenda masengo gao gose kuti apate kuloleka ni ŵandu. Akuwala indu yailembekwe malembelo ga malajisyo pachanya meeso ni konjechesya ukulu wa nguo syao kuti aloleche ali ŵandu ŵa Akunnungu.
MAT 23:6 Ikwanonyela kutama peuto pa kuchimbichikwa mu indimba ni itengu ya kuchimbichikwa mmajumba ga kupopelela.
MAT 23:7 Ikwanonyela kwakomasya kwa kwachimbichisya pa kusumichisya malonda ni kusaka ŵandu ŵaŵilanje, ‘Jwakwiganya.’
MAT 23:8 Nambo ŵanyamwe nkaŵilanjikwa ‘Jwakwiganya,’ pakuŵa jwakwiganya jwenu ali jumo pe, ni wose ndi achalongo.
MAT 23:9 Atamuno ngasimummilanga mundu ‘Atati’ pa chilambo pano, pakuŵa Atati ŵetu ali ŵamo pe, ŵaali kwinani.
MAT 23:10 Atamuno ngasimmilanjikwa ‘ilongola’ pakuŵa chilongola jwenu ali jumo pe, yaani Kilisito.
MAT 23:11 Nombe jwali jwankulungwa jwenu chaaŵe katumetume jwenu.
MAT 23:12 Jwakulikwesya chatuluswe ni jwakulitulusya chachikweswa.
MAT 23:13 “Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Pakuŵa nkuugala nnango wa Umwenye wa kwinani mmbujo pa ŵandu. Ni ŵanyamwe mwachinsyene ngankwinjila, atamuno ngankwaleka ŵakusaka kwinjila ajinjile.
MAT 23:14 Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkwasumula ŵawililwe ni achiŵankwawo ipanje yao nchilitendaga ŵandu ŵambone nkupopela mapopelo gamaleu, kwa lye ligongo lyo kulaga kwenu chikuŵe kwakukulungwa nnope.
MAT 23:15 “Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Pakuŵa nkutaŵa ulendo mu bahali ni pa chilambo kuti nkombole kuntenda namose mundu jumo aŵe jwa kunkuya mwanya. Pankumpata, nkuntenda aŵe mundu jwakwinjila ku jehanamu kumpunda mwachinsyene.
MAT 23:16 “Ulaje uwe kukwenu ilongola ŵangalola! Ŵanyamwe nkutinji mundu alumbililaga kwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, kwele kulumbila ko ngaŵa chindu, nambo alumbililaga kwa sahabu ja Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, kwele kulumbilila ko kukwakanganichisya kuchitenda chalumbilile.
MAT 23:17 Ŵanyamwe ŵangalola ŵakuloŵela! Chapi chachili cha malumbo nnope, sahabu pane Nyuumba ja Akunnungu jajikujitenda sahabu jiŵe jeswela?
MAT 23:18 Sooni nkutinji mundu alumbililaga pa chilisa ngaŵa chindu, nambo alumbilaga nkujikolanga mbopesi jajili pa chilisa, kwele kulumbilila ko kukwakanganichisya kuchitenda chalumbilile.
MAT 23:19 Ŵanyamwe ŵangalola! Ana kulumbilila chi kwakuli kwamalumbo nnope, kwa mbopesi pane kwa chilisa chachikujitenda mbopesi jiŵe jeswela?
MAT 23:20 Jwakulumbila kwa chilisa akulumbilila kwa chele chilisa cho, ni kwa chose chachili pachanya pakwe.
MAT 23:21 Ni jwakulumbila kwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu akulumbilila kwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ni kwa jwele jwakutama nkati mo.
MAT 23:22 Nombe jwakulumbila kwa kwinani akulumbilila kwa chitengu cha Umwenye wa Akunnungu, ni kwa jwele jwakutama pachanya pakwe.
MAT 23:23 “Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkupochela mbopesi kwa ŵandu, atamuno pa masamba ga kununjila, ni bisali ni jila, nkuileka indu yekulungwa yailajichikwe ni Malajisyo mpela ila kupanganya yaikwanonyelesya Akunnungu ni chanasa ni chikulupi. Gelega ni gankusachilwa kugakamulisya pangagaliŵalila gane.
MAT 23:24 ilongola ŵangalola! Nkujityosya membe mu yakung'wa, nambo nkuchimila chinyama chachikuŵilanjikwa ngamia!
MAT 23:25 “Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkosya chikombe ni mbale kwa paasa, nambo nkati nkuleka indu impatile kwa wiyi ni nsese.
MAT 23:26 Ugwe Mfalisayo jwangalola! Njosye chikombe nkati kaje ni paasa chipasalale.
MAT 23:27 “Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Pakuŵa nkulandana ni malembe gagasililwe ni chokaa, nombe kwa paasa gakuwoneka kuŵa gambone, nambo nkati mwakwe gagumbele maupa ga ŵawe ni usakwa wejinji.
MAT 23:28 Iyoyopeyo ni ŵanyamwe kwa paasa nkuoneka ni ŵandu kuŵa ŵambone nambo nkati ngumbele ulamba ni ungalimate.
MAT 23:29 “Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkugumba malembe ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu ni kugasalalisya malembe ga ŵandu ŵambone.
MAT 23:30 Nkutinji, ‘Tukaapali kalakala katema ka achambuje ŵetu, ngatukaŵe pamo mmaulajo ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu!’
MAT 23:31 Kwakuŵecheta yeleyo nkulilosya mwachinsyene kuti ŵanyamwe ndi achiŵana ŵa aŵala ŵaŵauleje ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu.
MAT 23:32 Hayaga, mmalichisye masengo gaŵachokwele achambuje ŵenu!
MAT 23:33 Ŵanyamwe ŵa uŵelesi wa lijoka lya sumu! Chimmutuche chinauli ulamusi wa ku jehanamu?
MAT 23:34 Nipele lye ligongo lyo une ngumpelechela ŵanyamwe ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu, ŵandu ŵa lunda ni ŵakwiganya malajisyo, ŵane mwa ŵanyawo chimwaulaje ni kwaŵamba pa nsalaba, ni ŵane chimwapute ibokola mmajumba genu ga kupopelela ni kwasosa mmisi jinajose.
MAT 23:35 Nipele chileŵo chichiŵe kukwenu kwa ligongo lya miasi ja ŵandu ŵambone jajijitiche mu chilambo muno. Elo chitandile chiwa chi che Habili jwanganakola chileŵo mpaka chi che Sakalia, mwana ju che Balakia, jumwammuleje pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu pasikati ja papaswela ni chilisa.
MAT 23:36 Isyene ngunsalila kuti, ŵandu ŵa uŵelesi u chalamulikwe kwa ligongo lya indu yi.
MAT 23:37 “Yelusalemu! Ugwe Yelusalemu! Nkwaulaga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu ni kwaputa maganga ŵelewo ŵaŵatumikwe kukwenu. Ana kalingwa nasachile kwasonganganya achiŵana ŵenu, mpela nguku ijikuti pakwasonganganya achiŵanagwe kusi kwa mapapiko gakwe, nambo mwakanile.
MAT 23:38 Ayaga nipele, nyuumba jenu chijisigale lisame pe.
MAT 23:39 Ngunsalila, ngamuumona sooni mpaka pachinchiti, ‘Akole upile jwele jwakwika mu liina lya Ambuje.’ ”
MAT 24:1 Che Yesu ŵakopweche pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ni paŵajaulaga, ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵajaulile ni kwalosya majumba ga Nyuumba ja Akunnungu.
MAT 24:2 Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Elo, gose gankugawona ga! Isyene ngunsalila kuti, ngapagwa liganga namuno limo lichilisigale pa line, kila chindu chichijonasikwe.”
MAT 24:3 Che Yesu paŵatemi ku chitumbi cha Miseituni, ŵakulijiganya ŵajaulile pa chisyepela, ŵausisye, “Ntusalile ana gelega chigatyochele chakachi? Ni chimanyisyo chi chakutulosya kwika kwenu ni kumbesi kwa chilambo chino?”
MAT 24:4 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Nlilolechesye kuti akaika kunnambusya mundu.
MAT 24:5 Pakuŵa achajinji chakopochele aninkuti, une ndili Kilisito nombewo chachasoyasya ŵandu ŵajinji.
MAT 24:6 Chimpikane yankati ngondo ni kusongona yankati ngondo, nambo nkatojima, pakuŵa gelega gakusachilwa gatyochele kaje, nambo kumbesi kwakwe kukanaŵe.
MAT 24:7 Chilambo chimo chichiputane ni chine, umwenye umo chiuputane ni wine. Kosekose kuchichiŵa ni sala ni chindendemesi cha chilambo.
MAT 24:8 Aga ganagose ga gali mpela kutanda kwa chilungusi.
MAT 24:9 “Nipele chachintyosya kuti ansausye ni kummulaga. Chinchichimwa ni ŵandu ŵa ilambo yose ligongo lya liina lyangu.
MAT 24:10 Sooni, achajinji chachileche chikulupi chao, chachigalaukana ni kuchimana jwine ni jwine.
MAT 24:11 Chachikopochela ŵakulondola ŵa unami achajinji chiŵalambusye ŵandu ŵajinji
MAT 24:12 Ligongo lya winji wa ungalimate, unonyelo wa ŵandu ŵajinji chiuchinandupa.
MAT 24:13 Nambo jwalijose juchapililile mpaka kumbesi, jwelejo ni juchakulupuche.
MAT 24:14 Nambo, kukanaŵe kwika kumbesi, aji Ngani Jambone ja umwenye wa Akunnungu chijilalichikwe pa chilambo chose jiŵe umboni kwa ilambo yose.
MAT 24:15 “Nipele, pachinchione ‘Chindu cha soni chachikusakasya Nyuumba ja Akunnungu’ chichaŵechetekwe ni che Danieli, jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu kuti chijimi peuto papaswela, ŵakusyoma amanyilile malumbo gakwe.
MAT 24:16 Pelepo, ŵaali ku Yudea autuchile kumatumbi.
MAT 24:17 Jwaali pachanya nyuumba akatuluka ni kwinjila nkati kukwigala chindu.
MAT 24:18 Jwaali ku migunda akauja panyuma kukwigala nguo jao.
MAT 24:19 Ulaje kukwao ŵele utachiŵa pachiilu ni ŵachajonjesye gele moŵa go!
MAT 24:20 Mpopele kuti kuutuka kwenu kunaŵe katema ka mbepo, atamuno Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila!
MAT 24:21 Pakuŵa kele katema ko chikupagwe kulaga kwakukulungwa kwati nganikupagwe chitandile kugumbikwa chilambo chino mpaka sambano, atamuno ngali pachikutyochele sooni.
MAT 24:22 Iŵaga gele moŵa go ngagakapunguchikwe, ngapagwa mundu jwakakulupwiche, nambo gele moŵa go chigapunguchikwe kwa ligongo lya ŵele ŵaŵasagulikwe.
MAT 24:23 “Nipele, kele katema ko mundu aikaga kunsalila, ‘Kilisito ali apa’ pane ‘Ali akuno,’ nkakulupilila.
MAT 24:24 Pakuŵa chachikopochela ŵanya kilisito ŵa unami ni ŵakulondola ŵa unami. Chachitenda imanyisyo yaikulungwa ni yakusimonjeka ya kwalambusya ŵandu yakombolekaga namose ŵasagulikwe ŵa Akunnungu.
MAT 24:25 Mpilikane, nanjamwiche chile kakanaŵe katema.
MAT 24:26 Nipele, ansalilaga kuti, ‘Nnole, ali mwipululu,’ nkajaula kweleko, pane ‘Nnole, ali munkati,’ nkakulupilila.
MAT 24:27 Pakuŵa, mpela njasi ijikuti kumesya kutyochela kungopochelo lyuŵa mpaka kulikutiŵila lyuŵa, iyoyo peyo ni ichijile kwika kwa Mwana jwa Mundu.
MAT 24:28 Pele pauli ntembo, ni patachisongangana achikapungu.
MAT 24:29 “Nambo nkumala kulaga kwa ge moŵa go, lyuŵa chilipilile, ni lwesi ngalulanguchisya, ni ndondwa sisipatuche kutyochela kwinani ni machili ga kwinani chigachitinganyika.
MAT 24:30 Nipele, chimanyisyo cha Mwana jwa Mundu chichioneche kwinani, pelepo ŵandu wose ŵa pa chilambo chalile, Chachimmona Mwana jwa Mundu ali nkwika pachanya maunde ga kwiunde, ni machili ni ukulu wekulungwa.
MAT 24:31 Nombe chachatuma achikatumetume ŵao ŵa kwinani ali akamulile mapenga ga kusona nnope, ni ŵanyawo chachasonganganya ŵandu ŵao uŵasagulikwe kutyochela mbande syose ncheche sya chilambo, chitandile aji mbesi ja kwinani mpaka aji mbesi ji.
MAT 24:32 “Kwa chitela cha ntini nlijiganye achi chitagu chi, Paukutanda kola nyambi ni kusipuka masamba, ŵanyamwe nkumanyilila kuti katema ka chuuku kaŵandichile.
MAT 24:33 Iyoyo peyo ŵanyamwe pachingaone aga gose ga gali nkutendekwa, mmanyilile kuti katema ka une kuuja kaŵandichile.
MAT 24:34 Isyene ngunsalila, Au uŵelesi u ngaupita gakanaŵe kutendekwa aga gose ga.
MAT 24:35 Kwinani ni chilambo chiichipita, nambo maloŵe gangu ngagapita ng'o.
MAT 24:36 “Nambo, yankati lyuŵa ni saa, ngapagwa ŵakuimanyilila chakachi chiikopochele, atamuno achikatumetume ŵa kwinani, atamuno Mwana, Atati jika pe ni ŵakumanyilila.
MAT 24:37 Pakuŵa yaitite mmoŵa ga che Nuhu, ni iyoyo ichichiŵa kwika kwa Mwana jwa Mundu.
MAT 24:38 Pakuŵa gele moŵa go, chikumba meesi chachikulungwa chikanaŵe, ŵandu ŵalyaga ni kung'wa, ni ŵalombelaga ni kulombwa, mpaka lye lyuŵa lyo che Nuhu paŵajinjile mu safina.
MAT 24:39 Nganamanyilila mpaka chikumba meesi pachaiche ni kwakumba wose. Ni iyoyo ichichiŵa kwika kwa Mwana jwa Mundu.
MAT 24:40 Kele katema ko ŵandu ŵaŵili chachiŵa ku ngunda, jumo chachijigalikwa ni jwine kulekwa.
MAT 24:41 Achakongwe ŵaŵili chachiŵa aninkusyaga, jumo chachijigalikwa ni jwine kulekwa.
MAT 24:42 Nipele, nlilolechesye, pakuŵa ngankumanyilila lyuŵa chi litaiche Ambuje wenu.
MAT 24:43 Nambo nkumbuchile lyeleli, kuti akaimanyi nsyene nyuumba katema chi jwawiyi pataiche, akachesisye, ngakajileche nyuumba jakwe jijonasikwe.
MAT 24:44 Kwalye ligongo lyo, ŵanyamwe nliŵiche chile, pakuŵa ngankumanyilila katema kachaiche Mwana jwa Mundu.”
MAT 24:45 Che Yesu ŵapundile kuŵecheta, “Nipele nduni jwali jwakutumichila jwakukulupilichika ni lunda, jwati ambujegwe chammiche pachanya pa ŵandu ŵao, ŵape chakulya katema kakwe?
MAT 24:46 Jwana upile jwakutumichila jo pataiche ambujegwe juchansimane aninkutendekanya yeleyo.
MAT 24:47 Isyene ngunsalila, chachimmika jwele katumetume jo alindilile chipanje chakwe chose.
MAT 24:48 Nambo jwakutumichila aŵaga jwangalumbana atiji muntima mwakwe kuti, ‘Ambuje ŵangu akukaŵa kuuja,’
MAT 24:49 ni kutanda kwaputa achikapolo achinjakwe ni kulya ni kung'wa pamo ni ŵakolelwa,
MAT 24:50 ambujegwe kapolo jula chachiika lyuŵa lyangakulilolela ni saa jangakujimanya.
MAT 24:51 Chachinjamuka wamba ni kummika mu mpingo umo ni ŵaulamba. Kweleko chikuŵe ni kulila ni kuchilimya meeno.
MAT 25:1 “Kele katema ko, Umwenye wa kwinani chiulandane ni achiŵali likumi ŵaŵajigele ibatali yao, ŵatyosile kwachingamila ambuje ŵa ulombela.
MAT 25:2 Nsano ŵao ŵaliji ŵakuloŵela ni nsano ŵaliji ŵakalamuka.
MAT 25:3 Ŵaŵaliji ŵakuloŵela ŵala ŵajigele ibatali yao, nambo nganajigala mauta ga akiba.
MAT 25:4 Nambo ŵele ŵaŵaliji ŵakalamuka ŵala ŵajigele mauta mu yupa pamo ni ibatali yao.
MAT 25:5 Pakuŵa ambuje ŵaulombela ŵakaŵile kwika, achiŵali ŵala wose ŵagwesele ni kugona.
MAT 25:6 Nambo sikati chilo nnope kwapali kunyokonya, ‘Nnole! Ambuje ŵaulombela akwika, njaule nkaachingamile.’
MAT 25:7 Pelepo achiŵali ŵala wose ŵajimwiche, ŵaiŵisile chile ibatali yao.
MAT 25:8 Ŵele ŵakuloŵela ŵala ŵaasalile ŵakalamuka kuti, ‘Mtupe mauta genu kanandi pakuŵa ibatali yetu ikusimika.’
MAT 25:9 Nambo ŵakalamuka ŵala ŵajanjile, ‘Ngagatukwana uwe ni ŵanyamwe! Mmbaya njaule kwa kusumisya nkalisumile mwachinsyene!’
MAT 25:10 Nipele, ŵele achiŵali ŵakuloŵela wo paŵajawile kusuma mauta, ambuje ŵaulombela ŵaiche, ni achiŵali ŵaŵaliŵisile chile ŵajinjile pamo nawo mu nyuumba ja ulombela ni nnango waugalikwe.
MAT 25:11 Kanyuma achiŵali ŵane ŵala ŵaiche, ŵaaŵilasile, ‘Achimwene, achimwene, ntuugulile!’
MAT 25:12 Nambo ŵelewo ŵajanjile, ‘Ngunsalila isyene, ngangummanyilila ŵanyamwe.’ ”
MAT 25:13 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵatite, “Nlilolechesye, pakuŵa ngankumanyilila lyuŵa atamuno saa pachaiche Mwana jwa Mundu.
MAT 25:14 “Pakuŵa Umwenye wa kwinani uli mpela mundu jwasachile kwaula ulendo, ŵaaŵilasile ŵakutumichila ŵao ni kwalechela chipanje chakwe.
MAT 25:15 Ŵampele kila jumo ichaikombole, jumo maunjili nsano ga mbiya, ni jwine maunjili gaŵili ni jwine liunjili limo, ni ŵajawile.
MAT 25:16 Nipele, juŵapochele mbiya maunjili nsano ŵajawile kukusumisya malonda ni ŵapatile mbiya sine maunjili nsano.
MAT 25:17 Ilaila juŵapochele mbiya maunjili gaŵili jula, ŵapatile sine maunjili gaŵili.
MAT 25:18 Nambo jwele juŵapochele mbiya liunjili limo jula, ŵajawile, ni kusola lisimbo paasi, ni ŵasisile mbiya ja achimwene jwao.
MAT 25:19 “Pagapite moŵa gamajinji, achimwene jwa ŵakutumichila ŵala ŵausile, ni ŵatandite kuŵalanjila mbiya sisyatumiche ni mbiya sisyapatikene mu mbiya syakwe.
MAT 25:20 Katumetume juŵapochele mbiya maunjili nsano ŵaiche ali ajigele gane nsano, ŵaasalile, ‘Achimwene, mwambele maunjili nsano ga mbiya, nnole, nyonjechesye maunjili gane nsano.’
MAT 25:21 Achimwene jwao ŵansalile jwelejo kuti, ‘Yambone, jwakutumichila jwambone ni jwakukulupilichika. Ndi jwakukulupilichika kwa indu yainandi pe, chinampe yejinji. Njise kukusengwa pamo ni achimwene jwenu.’
MAT 25:22 “Sooni jwakutumichila juŵapochele mbiya maunjili gaŵili ŵaiche, ŵatyosisye mbiya sine maunjili gaŵili gagajonjechekwe, ŵatite, ‘Achimwene, mwambele mbiya maunjili gaŵili. Nnole, mbatile sine maunjili gaŵili gagajonjechekwe.’
MAT 25:23 Achimwene jwao ŵansalile jwelejo kuti, ‘Yambone, jwakutumichila jwambone ni jwakukulupilichika. Ndi jwakukulupilichika kwa indu yainandi pe, chinampe yejinji. Njise kukusengwa pamo ni achimwene jwenu.’
MAT 25:24 “Nambo juŵapochele mbiya liunjili limo jula ŵaiche, ŵatite, ‘Achimwene, nguimanyilila kuti mwe ndi ŵakulimba, mmweji nkugungula pa nganimpande, ni kusonganganya panganimmisa.
MAT 25:25 Najogwepe, najisisile mbiya jenu paasi. Nipele njigale mbiya jenu.’
MAT 25:26 “Achimwene jwao ŵanjanjile, ‘Mwe ndi jwakutumichila jwangalumbana ni jwa ulesi! Nkuumanyilila kuti une ngugungula panganimbande, ni kusonganganya panganimisa.
MAT 25:27 Nipele yammajile kujiŵika mbiya jangu mu nyuumba ja kugosela mbiya, none pachiiche ngajijigele jajili jangu ni chakonjecheka chakwe!
MAT 25:28 Munsumule mbiya jo mumpe jwakwete mbiya maunjili likumi.
MAT 25:29 Pakuŵa, jwali ni chindu chapegwe ni konjechekwa. Nambo jwanganakola chindu, ata chele chakwete cho chichijigalikwe.
MAT 25:30 Yankati jwakutumichila jwangaikanacho chakonjecheka, mumponye paasa ku chipi! Kweleko chikuŵe ni kulila ni kuchilimya meeno.’ ”
MAT 25:31 “Katema kachaiche Mwana jwa Mundu mu ukulu wakwe ni achikatumetume ŵa kwinani wose ali pamo nawo, pelepo chachitama pa chitengu chao cha umwenye chachili ni ukulu.
MAT 25:32 Ŵandu ŵa ilambo yose chasongangane mmbujo mwao, nombe chachalekanganya ŵandu mpela ŵakuchinga yakuti pakusilekanganya ngondolo ni mbusi.
MAT 25:33 Chaachisiŵika ngondolo yaani ŵandu ŵambone kundyo kwakwe ni mbusi yaani ŵandu ŵangalumbana kunchiji kwakwe.
MAT 25:34 “Nombe Mwenye chiŵasalile ŵaali ŵa kundyo kwakwe kuti, ‘Njise ŵanyamwe ŵampegwile upile ni Atati ŵangu, mpochele umwenye ŵampanganyichisye chile chitandile kugumbikwa chilambo.
MAT 25:35 Pakuŵa jangwete sala ni ŵanyamwe mwambele chakulya ni jangwete njota ni ŵanyamwe mwambele meesi ni naliji jwannendo ni ŵanyamwe mwambochele mmajumba genu.
MAT 25:36 Naliji matakope, ŵanyamwe mwandakwisye ni naliji jwakulwala ŵanyamwe mwaaiche kukuunola ni naliji jwantawe ŵanyamwe mwanyimajimile.’
MAT 25:37 Pelepo, ŵandu ŵakupanganya yaili yambone paujo pa Akunnungu chiŵajanje mwenye kuti, ‘Ambuje, ana chakachi twambweni ŵa sala ni kumpa chakulya, pane jinkwete njota ni kung'wesya meesi?
MAT 25:38 Ana chakachi twammweni nli jwannendo ni kumpochela, pane matakope ni kuntakusya?
MAT 25:39 Chakachi twammweni ndi nkulwala pane jwantawe ni kwika kukunnola?’
MAT 25:40 Mwenye chiŵajanje, ‘Ngunsalila isyene, chachilichose chimwantendele jumo jwa ŵanyaŵa achalongo ŵangu achanandi, mwandendele une.’
MAT 25:41 “Nipele chiŵasalile ŵele ŵaali kunchiji kwao, ‘Ntyoche mmbujo mwangu ŵanyamwe ŵankwete malweso! Njaule ku mooto moŵa gose pangali mbesi wangasimika, wauŵichikwe chile kwa ligongo lya Shetani ni achikatumetume ŵakwe.
MAT 25:42 Pakuŵa jangwete sala nganimumba chakulya, jangwete njota nganimumba meesi.
MAT 25:43 Naliji jwannendo nganimumbochela mmajumba genu ni panaliji matakope nganimumba nguo ni nalwalaga ni nataŵikwe nganinnyika kukulola.’
MAT 25:44 “Pelepo nombe chajanje, ‘Ambuje, ana chakachi twammweni ndi jinkwete sala ni njota, ni ndi jwannendo pane matakope, ni ndi nkulwala pane jwantaŵikwe, nowe nganitunkamusya?’
MAT 25:45 Mwenye chajanje, ‘Ngunsalila isyene, kila pamwakanaga kumpanganichisya gelega jumo jwa ŵanyaŵa achanandi ŵa, mwakanile kuumbanganichisya une.’
MAT 25:46 Nipele, ŵanyaŵa chajaule kumasausyo moŵa gose pangali mbesi, nambo ŵandu ŵakupanganya yaili yambone paujo pa Akunnungu chajaule ku umi wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi.”
MAT 26:1 Che Yesu paŵamalisisye kuŵecheta gelego gose, ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao,
MAT 26:2 “Nkumanyilila kuti pachigamale moŵa gaŵili chichiŵe chindimba cha Pasaka, ni Mwana jwa Mundu chakatyosyekwe kuti aŵambikwe pa nsalaba.”
MAT 26:3 Katema ko achakulu ŵa mbopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu ŵasimene pa nsana wa nyuumba ja Jwankulu Jwambopesi jwaŵilanjikwe che Kayafa.
MAT 26:4 Ŵajilene ichajile pa kwakamula Che Yesu kwa malindi ni kwaulaga.
MAT 26:5 Nambo ŵatite chele chindu chinatyochele katema ka lyuŵa lya chindimba cha Pasaka, ngakaŵa chikutyochele kutindiganya pa ŵandu.
MAT 26:6 Che Yesu paŵaliji ku Besania, ku nyuumba ji che Simoni, juŵalamile matana.
MAT 26:7 Jwankongwe jumo juŵaliji ni chuupa chachikolochekwe ni liganga lya alabasta chachili ni mauta ga kununjila nnope ni ga ndalama jajikulungwa, ŵaichilile Che Yesu paŵatemi kulya chakulya, ŵajitile mauta muntwe.
MAT 26:8 Ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵaiweni yele ŵatumbile, ŵatite, “Awu uwonasi u wa chichi?
MAT 26:9 Aga mauta ga ngati gakasumichikwe kwa mbiya jekulungwa, ni kupegwa ŵakulaga.”
MAT 26:10 Che Yesu ŵasimanyilile ng'anisyo syao, ŵaasalile, “Ligongo chi nkunsausya jwankongwe jo? Jwele atesile yambone kukwangu.”
MAT 26:11 Ŵakulaga alinji moŵa gose ni ŵanyamwe, nambo une nguuŵa ni ŵanyamwe moŵa gose.
MAT 26:12 Aju jwankongwe ju anyitilile pa chiilu mauta ga kununjila kuti amiche chile kwa masiko gangu.
MAT 26:13 Ngunsalila isyene, papali pose pa chilambo pano patachilalichila Ngani Jambone ji, achi chatesile jwankongwe ju chichisalichikwe kwa kunkumbuchila.
MAT 26:14 Nipele, che Yuda Isikaliote, jumo jwa likumi ni ŵaŵili ŵala, ŵajawile kwa achakulu ŵa mbopesi,
MAT 26:15 ŵausisye, “Ana chimuumbe ichichi nannyichisyaga Che Yesu kukwenu?” Ŵaŵalanjile ipande selasini ya feza.
MAT 26:16 Chitandile kele katema ko che Yuda ŵasosaga lipesa lya kwaichisya kukwao.
MAT 26:17 Lyuŵa limo likanaŵe lyuŵa lya chindimba cha mikate jangatagwa amila, ŵakulijiganya ŵajaulile Che Yesu ni kwausya, “Ana kwapi nkusaka tukankolochesye chakulya cha Pasaka?”
MAT 26:18 Ŵajanjile, “Njaule mmusi kwa mundu jumpepe, nkansalile, ‘Jwakwiganya akuti, katema kangu kaiche, chindye chakulya cha Pasaka kumangwenu pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵangu.’ ”
MAT 26:19 Ŵakulijiganya ŵala ŵatesile mpela iŵatite pakusalilwa ni Che Yesu, ŵakolosisye chakulya cha Pasaka.
MAT 26:20 Ligulo, Che Yesu ŵatemi pakulila chakulya pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao kumi na mbili.
MAT 26:21 Paŵalyaga, Che Yesu ŵatite, “Ngunsalila isyene, jumo jwenu chakang'alauche.”
MAT 26:22 Ŵakulijiganya ŵasupwiche nnope, ŵatandite kuusya jumo jumo, “Ambuje! Uli, ndili une?”
MAT 26:23 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Juchakatoŵele nkate mumbale pampepe ni une jujojo ni juchakang'alauche.
MAT 26:24 Elo, Mwana jwa Mundu chawe mpela Malembelo ga Akunnungu igakuti pakusala, nambo ulaje kwa jwelejo juchakangalauche Mwana jwa Mundu! Ikaliji mmbaya ngakapagwe jwele mundu jo.”
MAT 26:25 Che Yuda, juŵangalawiche, ŵausisye, “Jwakwiganya! Ndili une?” Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ugwe mmechete.”
MAT 26:26 Paŵalyaga, Che Yesu ŵaujigele nkate, ŵatogolele Akunnungu, ŵaugaŵenye, ŵapele ŵakulijiganya ŵao achitiji, “Njigale ndye, achi ni chiilu changu.”
MAT 26:27 Nipele ŵachijigele chikombe cha divai, ŵatogolele, ŵapele achitiji, “Nng'welele achi ŵanawose,
MAT 26:28 pakuŵa aji ni miasi jangu ja lilangano jajikwitika kwa ligongo lya ŵajinji kwa kwalechelesya sambi.
MAT 26:29 Nambo ngunsalila kuti nguung'wa sooni divai ja sabibu mpaka paching'we jasambano pamo ni ŵanyamwe mu umwenye wa Atati ŵangu.”
MAT 26:30 Paŵamasile kwimba lujimbo lwa kulapa, ŵatyosile, ŵajawile kuchikwesya cha Miseituni.
MAT 26:31 Nipele Che Yesu ŵaasalile sooni, “Chilo cha lelo jino, ŵanyamwe ŵanawose chinchimwe ni une, pakuŵa Malembelo ga Akunnungu gakuti, ‘Chinampute jwakuchinga ni mpingo wa ngondolo chipwilingane.’
MAT 26:32 Nambo pachimale kusyuka, chinannongolele ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:33 Che Petulo ŵaasalile Che Yesu, “Nachiŵamuno ŵanawose chachimwe ni mmwe ni kunneka, nambo une ngali pachinanneche.”
MAT 26:34 Che Yesu ŵansalile che Petulo, “Ngunsalila isyene, chilo chino jikanaŵe kutongola tambala, chimungane katatu.”
MAT 26:35 Che Petulo ŵatite, “Iŵaga chingawe pamo nomwe, ngasinankana.” Ŵakulijiganya ŵane ŵala ŵanawose ŵatite iyoyo.
MAT 26:36 Nipele Che Yesu ŵajawile pamo nawo kwiuto kwakukuŵilanjikwa ku Getesemane, ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti, “Ntame apano une ngwaula ako kukupopela.”
MAT 26:37 Ŵalongene nawo che Petulo pamo ni ŵanache ŵaŵili ŵa chilume ŵa che Sebedayo, ŵatandite kusupuka nnope ni kulagasika.
MAT 26:38 Pelepo ŵaasalile, “Ngusupuka nnope muntima mpaka chiŵandi kuwa. Ntame apano ni nchesye pamo ni une.”
MAT 26:39 Nipele, ŵajawile mmbujo kanandi, ŵagwile manguku, ŵapopele achitiji, “Atati ŵangu, iŵaga ikukomboleka, achi chikombe cha malagasyo chimbite, nambo ngaŵa kwa kusaka une, nambo iŵe mpela inkuti pakusaka mmwe.”
MAT 26:40 Ŵajaulile ŵakulijiganya ŵala, ŵasimene agonile, ŵaasalile che Petulo, “Ana uli, nganinkombola kuchesya pamo ni une atamuno saa jimope?
MAT 26:41 Nchesye ni kupopela kuti nkaika kwinjila nkulinjikwa. Mbumu jikusaka nambo chiilu changali machili.”
MAT 26:42 Che Yesu ŵajawile sooni kaaŵili kukupopela, “Atati ŵangu, iŵaga ngaikomboleka achi chikombe cha malagasyo chipite pangang'welela une, nipele, chinkusaka chitendekwe.”
MAT 26:43 Ŵajaulile sooni ŵakulijiganya ŵao, ŵasimene agonile, pakuŵa meeso gao gatopelwe ni lugono.
MAT 26:44 Nipele ŵalesile, ŵajawile sooni kukupopela kaatatu kwa maloŵe galagala.
MAT 26:45 Nipele ŵajaulile ŵakulijiganya ŵala, ŵaasalile, “Ana uli, chiŵela nli mu lugono ni kupumulila? Nnole katema kasyene kaiche, ni Mwana jwa Mundu chatajikwe mmakono mwa ŵandu ŵa sambi.
MAT 26:46 Njime, twende. Nnole! Akwika jwakuung'alauka.”
MAT 26:47 Nipele, Che Yesu paŵaliji nkuŵecheta nawo, ŵaiche che Yuda, jumo jwa ŵakulijiganya kumi na mbili ŵala. Pamo nawo ŵaiche ŵandu ŵajinji ali ajigele mapanga ni imbonga ŵaŵatumikwe ni achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu.
MAT 26:48 Juŵasachile kungalauka Che Yesu jo, ŵapele chimanyisyo kuti, “Juchinankomasye kwa kwakunnonyela ni jujojo, munkamule.”
MAT 26:49 Che Yuda ŵammandichile Che Yesu, ŵaasalile, “Ngunkomasya jwakwiganya!” Nipele ŵankomasisye kwa kwakumbata.
MAT 26:50 Che Yesu ŵansalile, “Ambusanga, ntende chinnyichile.” Pelepo ŵaiche ŵandu ŵala, ŵankamwile Che Yesu ni kwaŵika paasi pa ulamusi wao.
MAT 26:51 Jumo jwa ŵaŵaliji pamo ni Che Yesu ŵalisolomwele lipanga lyakwe, ŵamputile kapolo jwa Jwankulu Jwambopesi, ŵankatile liwiwi.
MAT 26:52 Pelepo Che Yesu ŵansalile jwejo, “Mmusye upanga wenu mwigonelo mwakwe, pakuŵa jwalijose jwakuulaga ni lipanga, chaulajikwe ni lipanga.
MAT 26:53 Uli ana ngankwimanyilila kuti ngukombola kwaŵenda Atati ŵangu ni kuumbelechela kupunda ŵangondo mipingo kumi na mbili ŵa achikatumetume ŵa kwinani?
MAT 26:54 Nambo chigamalile chinauli Malembelo ga Akunnungu gagakuti ikuŵajilwa kuwa?”
MAT 26:55 Katema kakoko Che Yesu ŵausalile mpingo wa ŵandu uŵaiche kukwakamula, “Uli nnyiche kukungamula kwa mapanga ni imbonga mpela ndili mundu jwangangugakamulichisya malajisyo? Moŵa gose naliji pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu njijiganyaga, nambo nganimungamula!
MAT 26:56 Nambo aga gose ga gatendekwe pakuti gamalile malembelo ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu.” Pelepo ŵakulijiganya ŵanawose ŵalesile, ŵatisile.
MAT 26:57 Nipele, ŵele ŵandu ŵaŵankamwile Che Yesu ŵanjawisye ku nyuumba ji che Kayafa juŵaliji Jwankulu Jwambopesi, kuŵasongangene ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni achachekulu.
MAT 26:58 Che Petulo ŵankuiye kwa kutali mpaka mu lutenje lwa Jwambopesi Jwankulu, ŵajinjile nkati pamo ni ŵakulindilila kuti alole ichikatendekwe.
MAT 26:59 Nipele, achakulu ŵambopesi ni nkungulu wose ŵausosile umboni wa unami kuti akombole kumbulaga Che Yesu.
MAT 26:60 Nambo nganapata umboni wauli wose, nachiŵamuno ŵaiche ŵandu ŵajinji ŵa unami. Kumbesi kwakwe ŵaiche ŵandu ŵaŵili.
MAT 26:61 Ŵatite, “Aju mundu ju ŵatite, ‘Ngukombola kujigumula Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ni kujitaŵa sooni kwa moŵa gatatu.’ ”
MAT 26:62 Jwambopesi Jwankulu ŵajimi, ŵammusisye Che Yesu, “Ana ngankwanga liloŵe? Ana ŵandu ŵa akummechetela chichi?”
MAT 26:63 Nambo Che Yesu ŵatemi ji. Jwambopesi Jwankulu ŵansalile, “Ngunnumbisya kwa Akunnungu ŵaali ŵajumi, ntusalile naga isyene mmwe ni Kilisito, Mwana jwa Akunnungu!”
MAT 26:64 Che Yesu ŵanjanjile, “Mmwe mmechete! Nambo ngunsalila kuti, chitandile sambano chimumbone Mwana jwa Mundu ali atemi kundyo kwa Ambuje ŵa machili, chimumbone iyoyo achiikaga pa maunde ga kwinani.”
MAT 26:65 Pelepo, Jwambopesi Jwankulu ŵapapulenye nguo syao, ŵatite, “Ŵatukene Akunnungu! Uli tukuusaka sooni umboni nkati jweleju? Sambano mpilikene yatite pakwatukana Akunnungu.
MAT 26:66 Ŵanyamwe nkuti uli?” Ŵanyawo ŵanjanjile, “Aŵajilwe kuwa!”
MAT 26:67 Nipele ŵansunile mata ku meeso, ŵamputile. Ŵane ŵamputile majanda palijeje,
MAT 26:68 achitiji, “Nlondole, alakwe Kilisito Jwakuwombola, ŵaani ŵamputile!”
MAT 26:69 Che Petulo ŵatemi paasa mu lutenje. Nipele, jwakutumichila jumo jwankongwe ŵanjaulile, nikuti, “Alakwe mwaliji pampepe ni Che Yesu jwa ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:70 Nambo che Petulo ŵakanile mmbujo mwa ŵanawose achitiji, “Ngangumanyilila inkuŵecheta yo.”
MAT 26:71 Paŵakopokaga paasa, katumetume jwine jwankongwe ŵammweni, ŵaasalile uŵaliji pelepo kuti, “Mundu ju ŵaliji pamo ni Che Yesu jwa ku Nasaleti.”
MAT 26:72 Che Petulo ŵakanile sooni kwa kulumbilila, “Ngangummanyilila mundu ju.”
MAT 26:73 Kanyuma kanandi, ŵandu ŵaŵaliji pelepo ŵajaulile che Petulo, ŵansalile, “Kusyene, mmwe nomwe nli jumo jwakwe, pakuŵa uŵechete wenu ukummanyisya.”
MAT 26:74 Pelepo che Petulo ŵatandite kulumbilila kwakulilwesya achitiji, “Ngangummanyilila mundu ju!” Katema kakoko tambala jatongwele.
MAT 26:75 Che Petulo ŵagakumbuchile maloŵe gaŵasalilwe ni Che Yesu kuti, “Chimungane katatu, jikanaŵe kutongola tambala.” Nipele, ŵatyosile paasa, ŵalisile nnope.
MAT 27:1 Pakwachele, achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu ŵajilene ichajile pakwaulaga Che Yesu.
MAT 27:2 Ŵataŵile magwedegwede, ŵanjigele, ŵampeleche ku che Pilato, jwankulu jwa Chiloma.
MAT 27:3 Pelepo, che Yuda juŵangalawiche, paŵaiweni kuti Che Yesu amasile kulamulikwa, ŵalilasiche muntima, ŵausisye kwa achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu ipande selasini ya feza.
MAT 27:4 Ŵaasalile, “Leŵile kwa kuntyosya mundu jwangali ni sambi aulajikwe.” Nambo ŵele ŵanyawo ŵatite, “Yeleyo ili yetuwe? Chimmanyilile mwasyene.”
MAT 27:5 Nombejo ŵaponyele feza sila pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ŵakopweche paasa, ŵajawile kukulitaŵilila.
MAT 27:6 Achakulu ŵambopesi ŵasijigele feza sila, nikuti, “Ngalumbana kusiŵika kwa jwakugosa feza sya Nyuumba ja Akunnungu pakuŵa sili feza sisyapatikene kwa kuulaga.”
MAT 27:7 Nipele, ŵajilene, ŵasumile ngunda wa lilongo kuti paŵe pakwasichila achalendo.
MAT 27:8 Nipele, mpaka lelo jino wele ngunda wo ukuŵilanjikwa ngunda uwasumikwe kwa feza sisyapatikene kwa kuulaga.
MAT 27:9 Kwa yeleyo maloŵe gaŵaŵechete che Yelemia jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu gamalile gagakuti, “Ŵajigele ipande selasini ya feza, malinga ni malipilo gaŵajilene Ŵaisilaeli kulipa kwa ligongo lyao.
MAT 27:10 Feza syo ŵasumile ngunda wa lilongo, mpela iŵanajisye Ambuje.”
MAT 27:11 Che Yesu ŵajimi mmbujo mwa jwankulu jwa chilambo. Nipele, jwankulu jwa Chiloma ŵammusisye, “Ana mmwe ni Mwenye jwa Ŵayahudi?” Che Yesu ŵanjanjile, “Mmwe mmechete.”
MAT 27:12 Nambo achakulu ŵambopesi ni achachekulu paŵammechetelaga, nganajanga.
MAT 27:13 Nipele che Pilato ŵammusisye, “Ana ngankupilikana ganagose gele gakummechetela go?”
MAT 27:14 Nambo Che Yesu nganajanga namose liloŵe limo, jwankulu jwa Chiloma jo ŵasimosile nnope.
MAT 27:15 Yasyoŵeleche jwankulu jwa Chiloma kwagopolela Myahudi jumo jwataŵikwe juŵansachile katema ka chindimba cha Pasaka.
MAT 27:16 Kele katema ko paliji ni jwantawe juŵamanyiche nnope, liina lyakwe che Balaba.
MAT 27:17 Nipele, paŵasongangene ŵandu pamo, che Pilato ŵausisye, “Ana nkusaka nangopole jwapi mwa ŵele ŵaŵili, che Balaba pane Che Yesu jwakuŵilanjikwa Kilisito?”
MAT 27:18 Pakuŵa ŵaimanyilile kuti ŵantyosisye kwa ligongo lya wiu.
MAT 27:19 Che Pilato paŵatemi pa chitengu cha kulamulila, ŵankwawo ŵaichenawo utenga wanti, “Nkalipasyapasya kutenda chachili chose nkati jwele mundu jwambone jo, pakuŵa lelo lasile mu sagamisi kwa ligongo lyakwe.”
MAT 27:20 Nambo achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵane ŵanyenjile ŵandu kuti ŵaŵende agopolwe che Balaba ni ŵaulaje Che Yesu.
MAT 27:21 Che Pilato ŵausisye ŵanyawo, “Nkunsaka jwapi nangopolele mwa ŵele ŵaŵili ŵa?” Ŵajanjile, “Che Balaba!”
MAT 27:22 Che Pilato ŵausisye ŵanyawo, “Sano, naatende chichi Che Yesu jwakuŵilanjikwa Kilisito?” Ŵanawose ŵatite, “Mwaŵambe pa nsalaba!”
MAT 27:23 Nambo che Pilato ŵausisye, “Ligongochi? Ungalumbana chi watesile?” Ŵanyawo ŵanyanyisye achitiji, “Mwaŵambe pa nsalaba!”
MAT 27:24 Nipele, che Pilato paŵaiweni kuti ngakukombola kupanganya chachili chose nambo kutindiganya kukutanda, ŵajigele meesi ni kunaŵa makono mmbujo pa ŵandu ni ŵatite, “Une ngangulipasyapasya nkati chiwa cha aju mundu ju, chinyimanyilile mwachinsyene.”
MAT 27:25 Ŵandu ŵanawose ŵatite, “Miasi jao jiŵe pachanya petu ni achiŵana ŵetu!”
MAT 27:26 Nipele che Pilato ŵagopolele che Balaba kutyochela mu nyuumba jakutaŵilwa, nambo paŵamasile kumputa Che Yesu ibokola ŵantyosisye kukwaŵamba pa nsalaba.
MAT 27:27 Nipele ŵangondo ŵa jwankulu jwa Chiloma ŵanjinjisye Che Yesu nkati likome, wansyungwile mpingo wose.
MAT 27:28 Ŵammusile nguo syao, ŵammwasisye mwinjilo wechejeu wa chimwenye.
MAT 27:29 Nipele ŵakolosiye chindu mpela singwa ja miiŵa, ŵammwasisye mu ntwe, sooni ŵammichile nnasi kundyo. Ŵatindiŵele mmbujo mwao ni kuntendela chanache achitiji, “Tukunkomasya Mwenye jwa Ŵayahudi!”
MAT 27:30 Ŵansunile mata, ŵaujigele nnasi ula ni kumputa mu ntwe.
MAT 27:31 Paŵamasile kuntendela chanache, ŵammusile mwinjilo ula ni kuntakusya nguo syao, nipele ŵampeleche kukwaŵamba pa nsalaba.
MAT 27:32 Paŵajaulaga, ŵansimene mundu jumo liina lyakwe che Simoni jwa musi wa ku Kulene, ŵankanganichisye kujigala nsalaba u Che Yesu.
MAT 27:33 Paŵaiche peuto papakuŵilanjikwa Goligota, malumbo gakwe, peuto pa Chikalakasa cha Ntwe,
MAT 27:34 ŵampele divai jewanganye chindu chakuŵaŵa kutyosya kupeteka. Nambo Che Yesu nkupasya pe ŵakanile kung'wa.
MAT 27:35 Ŵaŵambile pa nsalaba, nipele ŵagaŵene nguo syao kwakutendela gudugudu.
MAT 27:36 Ŵatemi pepala, ŵaliji nkwalindilila.
MAT 27:37 Pachanya ntwe wakwe pa nsalaba ŵaŵisile chibao cha maloŵe gagalembekwe, “Aŵa ni Che Yesu, Mwenye jwa Ŵayahudi.”
MAT 27:38 Paliji ni ŵachiswamba ŵaŵili ŵaŵambikwe pamo nawo, jumo kunchiji ni jwine kundyo.
MAT 27:39 Ŵandu ŵaŵapitaga pelepo ŵantukene achipukunyaga mitwe jao nikuti,
MAT 27:40 “Mmwe jumwatite kuti nkukombola kujigumula Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ni kujitaŵa kwa moŵa gatatu. Sambano nlikulupusye mwasyene. Iŵaga mmwe ndi Mwana jwa Akunnungu, ntuluche pa nsalaba po!”
MAT 27:41 Iyoyo peyo achakulu ŵambopesi pamo ni ŵakwiganya malajisyo ni achachekulu ŵantendele chanache achitiji,
MAT 27:42 “Ŵakulupwisye ŵane, nambo asyene ngakukombola kulikulupusya! Iŵaga ŵele ali Mwenye jwa Ŵaisilaeli! Sambano atuluche pa nsalaba po, noweji tutwakulupile.
MAT 27:43 Ŵaakulupilile Akunnungu ni kuŵecheta kuti ŵele ali Mwana jwa Akunnungu, nipele, iŵaga Akunnungu akunsaka ŵakulupusye sambano.”
MAT 27:44 Iyoyo peyo ŵeŵala uŵaŵambikwe pamo nawo pa nsalaba nombe ŵantukene.
MAT 27:45 Chitandile lyuŵa pantwe mpaka saa tisa, chilambo chose chaliji chipi.
MAT 27:46 Pajaiche saa tisa Che Yesu ŵalisile kwa liloŵe lyekulungwa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Malumbo gakwe, “Akunnungu ŵangu, Akunnungu ŵangu, kwachichi mulesile?”
MAT 27:47 Nambo ŵandu ŵane ŵaŵajimi pele paŵapilikene yele ŵatite, “Akwaŵilanga che Elia.”
MAT 27:48 Jumo jwao ŵautwiche, ŵajigele lidodoki ni kunyoya mu divai jakuipa, ŵajiŵisile mu nnasi, ŵapele ang'we.
MAT 27:49 Ŵane ŵatite, “Nnindilile tulole iŵaga che Elia chaiche kukwakulupusya.”
MAT 27:50 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵalisile sooni kwa liloŵe lyekulungwa, ŵajasiche.
MAT 27:51 Pelepo nguo ja lusasa ja Nyuumba ja Akunnungu japapwiche pambindikati, kutyochela mwinani mpaka paasi, chilambo chatinganyiche ni lwala syapalwiche.
MAT 27:52 Malembe gaunukwiche ni iilu ya ŵandu ŵajinji ŵa Akunnungu ŵaŵajasiche ŵasyuchikwe.
MAT 27:53 Nombewo ŵakopweche mmalembe, ni Che Yesu paŵamasile kusyuka, ŵajinjile mu mmusi wa Akunnungu, yaani Yelusalemu, ni ŵandu ŵajinji ŵaweni.
MAT 27:54 Nipele, jwankulu jwa ŵangondo ni ŵangondo ŵane ŵaŵaliji pamo nawo achinlindililaga Che Yesu paŵachiweni chilambo chininkutinganyika ni gagakopochele gala, ŵajogwepe nnope, ŵatite, “Isyene aju mundu ju ŵaliji Mwana jwa Akunnungu.”
MAT 27:55 Pelepo paliji ni achakongwe ŵajinji ŵaŵalolechesyaga kwakutali. Ŵanyawo ni ŵeŵala ŵaŵankuiye Che Yesu kutyochela ku Galilaya ni kwatumichila.
MAT 27:56 Mwa ŵele ŵanyawo ŵaliji che Maliamu jwa musi wa ku Magidala ni che Maliamu achikulugwe che Yakobo ni che Yusufu, pamo ni achikulu ŵa ŵanache ŵa che Sebedayo.
MAT 27:57 Pakwaswele, ŵaiche mundu jumo jwa chipanje jwa musi wa ku Alimataya liina lyao che Yusufu, nombejo jwaliji jwakulijiganya jwa Che Yesu.
MAT 27:58 Ŵajawile kwa che Pilato, ŵaŵendile apegwe chiilu chi Che Yesu. Che Pilato ŵalamwile kuti apegwe.
MAT 27:59 Che Yusufu ŵachijigele chiilu chila, ŵachiŵijilile nguo jeswela mbee jajili jasambano,
MAT 27:60 Che Yusufu ŵachiŵisile chiilu chi Che Yesu mu lilembe lyasambano liŵasepile palwala kwa ligongo lyakwe nsyene. Nipele, ŵaligalambulile liganga lyekulungwa pa nnango wa lilembe ni kutyoka.
MAT 27:61 Che Maliamu jwa musi wa ku Magidala ni che Maliamu ŵane ŵala ŵatemi aninkulolechesya ku lilembe.
MAT 27:62 Malaŵi jakwe, yaani lyuŵa lyakuliŵika chile kwa ligongo lya Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila, achakulu ŵambopesi ni Mafalisayo ŵajaulile che Pilato,
MAT 27:63 Ŵatite, “Achimwene, tukukumbuchila kuti jwakulambusya jula akanaŵe kuwa ŵatite, ‘Pakumala moŵa gatatu chisyuche.’
MAT 27:64 Kwayele tukummenda mwasalile ŵangondo ajaule akalilindilile lilembe kwa moŵa gatatu, kuti ŵakulijiganya ŵao anakombole kuchijigala chiilu chao ni kwasalila ŵandu kuti asyuchile. Akuno kulambusya kwa mbesi kuno chikuŵe kwawamba nnope kupunda kwaandanda kula.”
MAT 27:65 Che Pilato ŵaasalile, “Ayaga, nkwete ŵangondo, njaule nkalilindilile inkuti pakukombola.”
MAT 27:66 Nipele, ŵajawile, ŵalilindilile lilembe, ŵaŵisile chiugulilo peganga ni kwaleka ŵangondo kulindilila.
MAT 28:1 Palyamasile Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila, kuninkucha lyuŵa lyaandanda lya chijuma, che Maliamu jwa musi wa ku Magidala ni che Maliamu jwine ŵajawile kukulilola lilembe.
MAT 28:2 Chisisimuchile chakopochele chindendemesi chachikulungwa cha chilambo, katumetume jwa kwinani jwa Ambuje ŵatulwiche kutyochela kwinani, ŵaligalambwile liganga lila ni kutamila.
MAT 28:3 Uwoneche wakwe waliji mpela kumesya ni nguo syakwe syaliji syeswela mbee.
MAT 28:4 Ŵakulindilila lilembe lila ŵatetemele kwa lipamba nnope, ŵaliji mpela ŵawe.
MAT 28:5 Nambo katumetume jwa kwinani jula ŵaasalile achakongwe ŵala achitiji, “Ŵanyamwe nkajogopa! Ngumanyilila kuti nkunsosa Che Yesu juŵaŵambikwe pa nsalaba.
MAT 28:6 Nganapagwa pelepa pakuŵa ŵamale kusyuka mpela iŵasasile. Njise kunnole paŵagonile.
MAT 28:7 Nipele, njaule chitema nkaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti asyuchile, nombewo akunnongolela ku Galilaya, kweleko chimwasimane. Ayaga, une jwammale kunsalila.”
MAT 28:8 Achiŵaga ni lipamba ni kusengwa kwakukulungwa, achakongwe wo ŵatyosile chitema ku lilembe, achiutukaga kukwasalila ŵakulijiganya ŵao.
MAT 28:9 Chisisimuchile, Che Yesu ŵasimene nawo, ŵatite “Ngunkomasya.” Achakongwe ŵala ŵajawile, ŵagakamwile makongolo gao ni kwapopelela.
MAT 28:10 Nipele Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Nkajogopa! Njaule nkaasalile achalongo ŵangu ajaule ku Galilaya, kweleko ni kuchakamone une.”
MAT 28:11 Achakongwe ŵala pawajaulaga, ŵakulindilila ŵampepe ŵa lilembe ŵajawile mu mmusi kukwasalila achakulu ŵambopesi yanayose iyatendekwe.
MAT 28:12 Nipele, ŵasimene pamo ni achachekulu, ŵatemi nkungulu, pakumala kukunguluka ŵapele ŵakulindilila ŵala mbiya syasijinji,
MAT 28:13 ni kwasalila, “Ŵanyamwe chinjile yeleyi, ‘Ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaiche chilo, ŵachijiŵile chiilu uwe tuli tugonile.’
MAT 28:14 Iŵaga chaimanye yeleyi jwankulu jwa chilambo, uwe chitwanyenje, ni ŵanyamwe ngamma ni masausyo.”
MAT 28:15 Ŵakulindilila ŵala ŵasijigele mbiya sila, ŵatesile mpela iŵatite pakusalilwa. Jele ngani jo jajenele pasikati ja Ŵayahudi mpaka lelo jino.
MAT 28:16 Ŵakulijiganya kumi na moja ŵala ŵajawile ku Galilaya ku chitumbi kwaŵasalilwe ni Che Yesu ajaule.
MAT 28:17 Paŵamweni, ŵampopelele, nambo ŵampepe mwa ŵanyawo ŵaliji ni lipamba.
MAT 28:18 Nipele Che Yesu ŵaiche chiŵandi, ŵaasalile, “Mbegwile ukombole wose kwinani ni pachilambo.
MAT 28:19 Nipele njaule, nkaatende ŵandu ŵa ilambo yose aŵe ŵakulijiganya ŵangu, nchabatisyaga kwa liina lya Atati ni lya Mwana ni lya Mbumu jwa Akunnungu.
MAT 28:20 Nkaajiganye kugakamulichisya gose mpela ila indite pakunnajisya ŵanyamwe. None ndili pamo ni ŵanyamwe moŵa gose, elo, mpaka kumbesi kwa chilambo.”
MAR 1:1 Jeleji jili ndande ja Ngani Jambone ji Che Yesu Kilisito, Mwana jwa Akunnungu.
MAR 1:2 Mpela ijitite pakulembekwa mmalembo ga che Isaya juŵaliji jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu, “Akunnungu ŵatite, ‘Nguntuma jwantenga jwangu annongolele, jwejejo ni juchankolochesye litala lyenu.’
MAR 1:3 Mundu akunyanyisya mwipululu achitiji, ‘Mwakolochesye Ambuje litala lyao, ngolosye mwakusaka kupita.’ ”
MAR 1:4 Che Yohana Ŵakubatisya ŵatamaga mwipululu ni kwalalichila ŵandu aleche sambi ni kwabatisya kuti Akunnungu ŵalechelesye sambi syao.
MAR 1:5 Ŵandu achajinji kutyochela chilambo cha Ŵayahudi ni musi wa ku Yelusalemu wose ŵajawile kukwapikanila che Yohana, ŵajitichisye sambi syao nombejo ŵabatisye mu lusulo lwa Yolodani.
MAR 1:6 Che Yohana ŵaliji awasile mwinjilo uwapotekwe ni manyunya ga chinyama chachikuŵilanjikwa ngamia ni nkaanda wa lipende nchiunu. Nombejo ŵalyaga itete ni uchi.
MAR 1:7 Ni ŵalalichilaga kwa ŵandu kuti, “Panyuma pangu akwika jwali ni machili kumbunda une. None nganguŵajilwa namose kukotama ni kugopola ngoji sya italawanda yakwe.
MAR 1:8 Uneji ngumbatisya ni meesi, nambo jwelejo chaachimbatisya kwa Mbumu jwa Akunnungu.”
MAR 1:9 Moŵa go, Che Yesu ŵaiche kutyochela musi wa ku Nasaleti wauli mu chilambo cha ku Galilaya ni ŵabatiswe ni che Yohana mu lusulo lwa Yolodani.
MAR 1:10 Che Yesu paŵakopokaga mmeesi, ŵakuweni kwinani kuugwiche ni Mbumu jwa Akunnungu ŵantuluchile achiŵaga mpela nguunda.
MAR 1:11 Liloŵe lya Akunnungu lyapikaniche kutyochela kwinani lichitiji, “Mmwejo ni Mwanangu jungunnonyela, nonyelwe nomwe.”
MAR 1:12 Papopo Mbumu jwa Akunnungu ŵanlongwesye Che Yesu kwaula mwipululu.
MAR 1:13 Ni ŵatemi mwipululu mo moŵa alobaini achilinjikwaga ni Shetani. Kukoko ŵatamaga pamo ni inyama ya mwitinji, nambo achikatumetume ŵa kwinani ŵaliji nkwakamuchisya.
MAR 1:14 Che Yohana paŵataŵikwe mu nyuumba jakutaŵilwa ŵandu, Che Yesu ŵajawile ku chilambo cha ku Galilaya kwalalichila ŵandu Ngani Jambone ja Akunnungu.
MAR 1:15 Ŵatite, “Katema kaiche ni Umwenye wa Akunnungu uŵandichile. Nneche sambi syenu ni kujikulupilila Ngani Jambone!”
MAR 1:16 Che Yesu paŵapitaga mungulugulu litanda lya Galilaya, ŵaweni ŵakukoka ŵaŵili, che Simoni pamo ni che Andulea mpwakwe ali nkukoka somba kwa lwau.
MAR 1:17 Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Munguye, none chinantende ŵanyamwe mme ŵakwaikanawo ŵandu kwa Ambuje.”
MAR 1:18 Papopo ŵalesile nyau syao ni kwakuya.
MAR 1:19 Che Yesu paŵajawile mmbujo kanandi, ŵaweni che Yakobo ni che Yohana, ŵanache ŵa che Sebedayo. Ni ŵanyawo ŵaliji mu ngalaŵa jao achisaulaga nyau syao.
MAR 1:20 Papopo Che Yesu paŵaweni, ŵaaŵilasile, ni ŵanyawo ŵalesile che Sebedayo atati ŵao mu ngalaŵa pamo ni ŵakwapanganyichisya masengo, ni ŵakuiye Che Yesu.
MAR 1:21 Che Yesu pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaiche musi wa Kapelenaumu, ni palyaiche Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila, Che Yesu ŵajinjile mu nyuumba ja kusimanilana Ŵayahudi, ni ŵatandite kwajiganya ŵandu maloŵe gambone ga Akunnungu.
MAR 1:22 Ŵandu wose ŵaŵampilikene ŵasimosile ni uwiganye wakwe, pakuŵa nganajiganya mpela ŵakwiganya Malajisyo, nambo ŵajiganyaga nti mundu jwali ni ulamusi.
MAR 1:23 Papopo mundu jwakamwilwe ni lisoka juŵaliji mu nyuumba ja kusimanilana jila ŵanyanyisye,
MAR 1:24 achitiji, “Ana nkusaka kututenda ichichi, mmwe Che Yesu jwa ku Nasaleti? Ana nnyiche kukutujonanga? Ngummanyilila kuti mmwejo ndi Jwanswela jwa Akunnungu!”
MAR 1:25 Che Yesu ŵalikalipile lisoka lyo achitiji, “Mmyalale! Munkopoche mundu jo.”
MAR 1:26 Nipele lisoka lyo lyantinganyisye mundu jula kwa machili ni kunyanyisya, ni lyakopweche.
MAR 1:27 Ŵandu wose ŵasimosile nnope ni ŵaliji nkuusyana, “Ana yelei ni yatiuli? Uli, gelega gali majiganyo ga sambano? Mundu ju akwete ulamusi wa kugakoposya namose masoka, nombego gakwajitichisya!”
MAR 1:28 Nipele, ngani jakwe Che Yesu jajenele kwachitema palipose, kuchilambo chose cha ku Galilaya.
MAR 1:29 Che Yesu ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao pamo ni che Yakobo ni che Yohana ŵakopweche mu nyuumba ja kusimanilana jila ni kwaula ku nyuumba ja ŵanya che Simoni ni che Andulea.
MAR 1:30 Akwegwao che Simoni jwankongwe, ŵagonile pachindanda ali nkulwala chiilu, ni Che Yesu naikape ŵasalilwe yankati jwakulwala jo.
MAR 1:31 Nipele Che Yesu ŵanjaulile jwankongwe jo ni ŵankamwile nkono ni kunjinamukula. Ulwele ula wannesile nipele ŵatandite kwatelechela.
MAR 1:32 Ligulo, lyuŵa lili litiŵile, ŵandu ŵaajauchisye Che Yesu ŵakulwala wose ni ŵaŵakamwilwe ni masoka.
MAR 1:33 Ŵandu wose ŵa musi wo ŵasongangene paluŵala lwa nyuumba.
MAR 1:34 Che Yesu ŵalamisye ŵandu ŵajinji ŵaŵaliji ni ilwele yakupisyangana ni kugakoposya masoka gamajinji gagaliji mwa ŵandu ŵala. Nganiŵapa masoka lipesa lyakuŵecheta chachilichose ligongo gaamanyilile ali ŵaani.
MAR 1:35 Kundaŵipe kukanaŵe kucha, Che Yesu ŵakopweche mu nyuumba jo ni kwaula paasa musi, pangali ŵandu kukupopela.
MAR 1:36 Che Simoni ni achinjakwe ŵala ŵajawile kukwasosa.
MAR 1:37 Paŵammweni ŵansalile, “Ŵandu wose ali nkunsosa mmwe.”
MAR 1:38 Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Tukusachilwa tujaule mmisinda jine jajiŵandichile akuno, ni kweleko ngusachilwa ngalalichile Ngani Jambone, pakuŵa yelei ni inyichile.”
MAR 1:39 Nipele, Che Yesu ŵajesilejesile ku Galilaya kose, achilalichilaga mmajumba gao ga kupopelela ni kugakoposya masoka.
MAR 1:40 Lyuŵa limo mundu jwa matana ŵaiche ku Che Yesu ni kwatindiŵalila ni kwachondelela kuti, “Mwasakaga muuswejesye!”
MAR 1:41 Che Yesu ŵankolele chanasa, ŵajongwele nkono wao ni ŵankwaiye ni kwasalila, “Ngusaka, Nswejele!”
MAR 1:42 Papopo matana gakwe gala gannesile ni ŵaswejele.
MAR 1:43 Nipele Che Yesu ŵansalile ajaule achinjamukaga kwa machili, achinsalilaga,
MAR 1:44 “Nnole, munansalile mundu jwalijose chindu chi, nambo njaule nkalilosye kwa jwambopesi, nkatyosye mbopesi mpela iŵatite pakusala che Musa kwalosya ŵandu wose kuti nnamile.”
MAR 1:45 Nambo mundu jula paŵakopweche, ŵatandite kwenesya ngani jo papalipose, namose Che Yesu nganakombola kwinjila sooni mmusi kwakulilosya. Nambo ŵatemi paasa musi, pangali ŵandu, atamuno yeleyo ŵandu kopochela papalipose ŵanjaulile kukokopeko.
MAR 2:1 Pagapite moŵa gampepe, Che Yesu ŵaujile sooni ku Kapelenaumu ni ŵandu ŵapilikene kuti ali pamusi.
MAR 2:2 Nipele ŵandu ŵajinji ŵasongangene atamuno nganilisigala lipesa lyalililyose, ni ŵagumbele mpaka paluŵala. Che Yesu ŵaliji nkwalalichila Liloŵe lya Akunnungu.
MAR 2:3 Pelepo ŵandu ncheche, ŵannyichisye mundu jwatatele ku Che Yesu.
MAR 2:4 Nambo kwaligongo lya winji wa ŵandu, nganakombola kunjausya jwakulwala pachiŵandi ni Che Yesu. Nipele, ŵapesekwile pa chipagala cha nyuumba palapala paŵaliji Che Yesu. Pelepo ŵantulwisye mundu jo ali agonile pa chitagala.
MAR 2:5 Che Yesu paŵachiweni chikulupi chao chila, ŵansalile jwakutatala jula, “Mwanangu, nlecheleswe sambi syenu.”
MAR 2:6 Ŵampepe mwa ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ga Akunnungu gaŵapele che Musa ŵaŵatemi pepala, ŵaliji nkuliusya mmitima jao,
MAR 2:7 “Ana akukombola chinauli kuŵecheta yelei? Akwatukana Akunnungu! Akunnungu pe ni ŵakukombola kulechelesya sambi.”
MAR 2:8 Papopo Che Yesu ŵaimanyilile yanayose iŵaganisyaga mmitima jao, ni ŵausisye, “Ana ligongo chi nkuganisya yelei mmitima jenu?
MAR 2:9 Ana chapi chachili chakwepepala, kunsalila mundu jwatatele ju, ‘Nlecheleswe sambi syenu,’ pane kunsalila, ‘Njimuche, njigale chitagala chenu njende’?
MAR 2:10 Nipele, ngusaka mmanyilile kuti Mwana jwa Mundu akwete ulamusi wa kulechelesya sambi sya ŵandu pachilambo pano.” Papopo ŵansalile mundu jwatatele jula,
MAR 2:11 “Ngunsalila, njimuche, njigale chitagala chenu, njaule kumangwenu!”
MAR 2:12 Ŵandu paŵannolechesyaga, mundu jula ŵajimwiche, ŵajigele chitagala chao ni kukopoka. Ŵandu wose ŵasimosile ni kwakusya Akunnungu achitiji, “Ngapagwa kose patwaiweni yanti yeleyi!”
MAR 2:13 Che Yesu ŵajawile sooni mungulugulu litanda lya Galilaya. Mpingo wa ŵandu wanjaulile ni Che Yesu ŵatandite kwajiganya.
MAR 2:14 Paŵaliji nkupita, ŵammweni che Lawi mwanache ju che Alufayo ali atemi pa nyuumba ja kukumbikanyila nsongo. Che Yesu ŵansalile, “Munguye!” Che Lawi ŵajimi ni ŵankuiye.
MAR 2:15 Kanyuma, Che Yesu ŵatemi mu nyuumba ji che Lawi kulya chakulya. Ŵakukumbikanya nsongo ŵajinji ni ŵandu ŵa sambi ni ŵandu, ŵaakuiye Che Yesu. Ni ŵajinji mwa ŵelewo ŵaliji nkulya pamo nawo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao.
MAR 2:16 Ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ŵampepe ŵaŵaliji Mafalisayo, paŵaiweni kuti Che Yesu akulya pamo ni ŵandu ŵangakukundikwa ni ŵandu ni ŵakukumbikanya nsongo, ŵausisye ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵala, “Kwachichi akulya ni ŵandu nti ŵeleŵa?”
MAR 2:17 Che Yesu paŵapilikene ŵaasalile, “Ŵandu ŵangakulwala ngakunlajila jwantela, nambo ŵakulwala. Une nganiika kukwaŵilanga ŵandu ŵambone, nambo ŵandu ŵa sambi.”
MAR 2:18 Katema kampepe ŵakulijiganya ŵa che Yohana ni ŵakulijiganya ŵa Mafalisayo ŵaliji nkutaŵa. Ŵandu ŵampepe ŵaiche ku Che Yesu ni kumbusya, “Ana ligongo chi ŵakulijiganya ŵa che Yohana ni ŵakulijiganya ŵa Mafalisayo akutaŵanga, nambo ŵakulijiganya ŵenu ngaakutaŵa?”
MAR 2:19 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ana ŵakuŵilanjikwa ku ulombela akukombola kutaŵa ni jwanlombela ali pamo nawo? Ngwamba! Ngaakukombola kutaŵa.
MAR 2:20 Nambo chiliiche lyuŵa mlombela jo pachajigalikwe mwa ŵanyawo, moŵa go ni pachachitaŵa.
MAR 2:21 “Ngapagwa mundu jwakukata chigamba cha nguo ja sambano ni kuchitotela mu nguo jakuwisala. Pakuŵa atendaga yeleyo chigamba chasambano cho chichinyale ni kupapula nguo jakuwisala jo ni papapapwiche po chipapunde kupapuka.
MAR 2:22 Ni sooni ngapagwa mundu jwakutaga divai jasambano mmisaku ja mapende jakuwisala. Pakuŵa atendaga yeleyo divai jasambano chijitutumule misaku jo ni kujipapula, divai chijimwasiche ni misaku chijijonasiche. Divai ja sambano jikutajikwa mmisaku ja mapende ja sambano.”
MAR 2:23 Pa Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila limo, Che Yesu pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaliji nkupita mmigunda ja ngano. Paŵaliji nkwenda ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵatandite kutema masache ga ngano.
MAR 2:24 Mafalisayo ŵaausisye Che Yesu achitiji, “Nnole! Ligongo chi ŵakulijiganya ŵenu akutenda yaikanichikwe kuipanganya pa Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila?”
MAR 2:25 Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ana nganinsyome iŵatesile che Daudi ni achinjakwe pajakwete sala?
MAR 2:26 Che Daudi ŵajinjile pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ni ŵalile mikate jijatyochekwe nti sadaka kwa Akunnungu. Yeleyi yatendekwe katema che Abiasali ali Jwambopesi Jwankulu. Ŵambopesi pe ni ŵaŵasachilwe kulya mikate jo, nambo che Daudi ŵalile, sooni ŵapele achinjakwe.”
MAR 2:27 Nipele Che Yesu ŵamalichisye kuŵecheta, “Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila lyaŵichikwe kwaligongo lya kwakamuchisya ŵandu nambo ngaŵa ŵandu kulitumichila Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila.
MAR 2:28 Nipele Mwana jwa Mundu ali Ambuje atamuno pa Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila.”
MAR 3:1 Nipele Che Yesu ŵajinjile sooni mu nyuumba ja kusimanilana Ŵayahudi ni mmomo mwaliji ni mundu jwapombotele nkono.
MAR 3:2 Ŵandu ŵampepe ŵaliji nkusosa ligongo lya kwakamulila Che Yesu. Nipele ŵaliji nkunnolechesya panepa chanlamye mundu jo pa Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila.
MAR 3:3 Che Yesu ŵansalile mundu jwapombotele nkono jula, “Njise paujo.”
MAR 3:4 Nipele Che Yesu ŵausisye, “Ana ili yambone pa Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila kuitendekanya yambone pane yangalumbana? Kukulupusya pane kuulaga?” Nambo ŵanyawo ŵamyalele.
MAR 3:5 Che Yesu ŵalolechesye wose kwa lutumbilo, ni ŵasupwiche ligongo mitima jao jaliji jekakatime. Nipele ŵansalile mundu jula, “Njongole nkono wenu!” Nombejo ŵaujongwele, ni nkono wao walamile.
MAR 3:6 Papopo, Mafalisayo ŵakopweche paasa pa nyuumba ja kusimanilana ni kuŵechetesyana ni ŵandu ŵa mpingo u che Helode itajile pakwaulaga Che Yesu.
MAR 3:7 Che Yesu pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵatyosile pelepo ni kwaula mungulugulu litanda lya Galilaya ni mpingo wa ŵandu wankuiye. Ŵandu wo ŵaumile mmisi ja ku Galilaya ni ku Yudea.
MAR 3:8 Paŵapilikene iŵaitesile Che Yesu, ŵandu ŵane ŵaichilile kutyochela mmisi ja ku Yelusalemu ni ku Idumea ni mmisi jajili peesi lusulo lwa Yolodani, ni kutyochela mmisi ja ku Tilo ni ku Sidoni.
